summary.span: 表示类型声明：类类型、接口类型、数组类型、值类型、枚举类型、类型参数、泛型类型定义，以及开放或封闭构造的泛型类型。

span.span: Represents type declarations: class types, interface types, array types, value types, enumeration types, type parameters, generic type definitions, and open or closed constructed generic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Type` 功能的根 ，是访问元数据的主要方式。`Type` is the root of the functionality and is the primary way to access metadata. 使用的成员 可以获取有关类型声明的信息，有关类型 (（如构造函数、方法、字段、属性和) 类的事件）的信息，以及部署该类的模块和程序集。Use the members of to get information about a type declaration, about the members of a type (such as the constructors, methods, fields, properties, and events of a class), as well as the module and the assembly in which the class is deployed. 无论其访问级别如何，代码都无需权限即可使用反射来获取有关类型及其成员的信息。No permissions are required for code to use reflection to get information about types and their members, regardless of their access levels. 代码不需要任何权限即可使用反射来访问公共成员，或访问级别使其在正常编译过程中可见的其他成员。No permissions are required for code to use reflection to access public members, or other members whose access levels would make them visible during normal compilation. 但是，为了使代码能够使用反射来访问通常不可访问的成员（如私有或内部方法）或类未继承的类型的受保护字段，你的代码必须具有 。However, in order for your code to use reflection to access members that would normally be inaccessible, such as private or internal methods, or protected fields of a type your class does not inherit, your code must have . 请参阅 [反射的安全注意事项](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection)。See [Security Considerations for Reflection](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection). `Type` 是允许多个实现的抽象基类。`Type` is an abstract base class that allows multiple implementations. 系统将始终提供派生类 `RuntimeType` 。The system will always provide the derived class `RuntimeType`. 在反射中，所有以 word 运行时开头的类在系统中只为每个对象创建一次，并支持比较运算。In reflection, all classes beginning with the word Runtime are created only once per object in the system and support comparison operations. > [!NOTE] > 在多线程方案中，不要锁定 对象以便同步对数据的访问 `static` 。In multithreading scenarios, do not lock objects in order to synchronize access to `static` data. 其他不能进行控制的代码也可能会锁定您的类类型。Other code, over which you have no control, might also lock your class type. 这可能会导致死锁。This might result in a deadlock. 相反，通过锁定专用对象来同步对静态数据的访问 `static` 。Instead, synchronize access to static data by locking a private `static` object. > [!NOTE] > 派生类可以访问调用代码的基类的受保护成员。A derived class can access protected members of the calling code's base classes. 此外，还允许访问调用代码的程序集的程序集成员。Also, access is allowed to assembly members of the calling code's assembly. 作为一种规则，如果允许在早期绑定代码中访问，则还允许在后期绑定代码中访问。As a rule, if you are allowed access in early-bound code, then you are also allowed access in late-bound code. > [!NOTE] > 扩展其他接口的接口不会继承扩展接口中定义的方法。Interfaces that extend other interfaces do not inherit the methods defined in the extended interfaces. 本部分内容：In this section: [类型对象表示哪些类型？](#WhatTypes) [What types does a Type object represent?](#WhatTypes) [检索类型对象](#Retrieve) [Retrieving a Type object](#Retrieve) [比较类型对象是否相等Comparing type objects for equality](#Equality) ## 类型对象表示哪些类型？What types does a Type object represent? 此类是线程安全的;多个线程可以同时从该类型的实例读取。This class is thread safe; multiple threads can concurrently read from an instance of this type. 类的实例 可以表示以下任何类型：An instance of the class can represent any of the following types: - 类Classes - 值类型Value types - 数组Arrays - 接口Interfaces - 枚举Enumerations - 委托Delegates - 构造的泛型类型和泛型类型定义Constructed generic types and generic type definitions - 构造的泛型类型、泛型类型定义和泛型方法定义的类型参数和类型参数Type arguments and type parameters of constructed generic types, generic type definitions, and generic method definitions ## 检索类型对象Retrieving a Type object 可以通过以下方式获取与特定类型关联的对象：The object associated with a particular type can be obtained in the following ways: - 实例 方法返回一个 对象，该对象表示实例的类型。The instance method returns a object that represents the type of an instance. 由于所有托管类型都派生自 ，因此 可在任何类型的实例上调用方法。Because all managed types derive from , the method can be called on an instance of any type. 下面的示例调用 方法以确定对象数组中每个对象的运行时类型。The following example calls the method to determine the runtime type of each object in an object array. [!code-cpp[System.Type#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cpp/GetType1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.Type#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cs/GetType1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/vb/GetType1.vb#2)] - 静态 方法返回 对象，该对象表示由其完全限定名称指定的类型。The static methods return a object that represents a type specified by its fully qualified name. - 、 和 方法返回 `Type` 对象，这些对象表示在模块中定义的类型。The , , and methods return `Type` objects that represent the types defined in a module. 第一种方法可用于获取 模块中定义的所有公共和私有类型的对象数组。The first method can be used to obtain an array of objects for all the public and private types defined in a module. (可以 `Module` 通过 或方法获取实例 ，也可以通过属性获取 。 ) (You can obtain an instance of `Module` through the or method, or through the property.) - 对象包含若干方法，用于检索在程序集中定义的类，包括 、 和 。The object contains a number of methods to retrieve the classes defined in an assembly, including , , and . - 方法返回某个类型支持的接口类型的筛选列表。The method returns a filtered list of interface types supported by a type. - 方法返回 `Type` 表示元素的对象。The method returns a `Type` object that represents the element. - 和 方法返回 对象，这些对象表示类型支持的接口类型。The and methods return objects representing the interface types supported by a type. - 方法返回对象的数组，这些 对象表示由任意一组对象指定的类型。The method returns an array of objects representing the types specified by an arbitrary set of objects. 对象是使用类型的数组指定的 。The objects are specified with an array of type . - 提供和 方法是为了实现 COM 互操作性。The and methods are provided for COM interoperability. 它们返回一个 对象，该对象表示由或指定的类型 `ProgID` `CLSID` 。They return a object that represents the type specified by a `ProgID` or `CLSID`. - 提供方法以实现互操作性。The method is provided for interoperability. 它将返回一个 `Type` 对象，该对象表示由类句柄指定的类型。It returns a `Type` object that represents the type specified by a class handle. - C # `typeof` 运算符、c + + `typeid` 运算符和 Visual Basic `GetType` 运算符获取类型的 `Type` 对象。The C# `typeof` operator, the C++ `typeid` operator, and the Visual Basic `GetType` operator obtain the `Type` object for a type. - 方法返回一个 对象，该对象表示构造的泛型类型（如果其属性返回，则为开放式构造类型 `true` ）; 否则返回一个封闭式构造类型。The method returns a object representing a constructed generic type, which is an open constructed type if its property returns `true`, and a closed constructed type otherwise. 泛型类型只能在关闭时进行实例化。A generic type can be instantiated only if it is closed. - 、 和 方法返回对象， 这些对象分别表示指定类型的数组、指向指定类型的指针，以及 Visual Basic) 中 (c # 中的引用参数的类型 `ref` `ByRef` 。The , , and methods return objects that represent, respectively, an array of a specified type, a pointer to a specified type, and the type of a reference parameter (`ref` in C#, `ByRef` in Visual Basic). ## 比较类型对象是否相等Comparing type objects for equality 一个 表示类型的对象是唯一的; 即， 当且仅当两个对象表示相同的类型时，这就引用相同的对象。A object that represents a type is unique; that is, two object references refer to the same object if and only if they represent the same type. 这允许 使用引用相等性比较对象。This allows for comparison of objects using reference equality. 下面的示例对 表示若干整数值的对象进行比较，以确定它们是否属于同一类型。The following example compares the objects that represent a number of integer values to determine whether they are of the same type. [!code-cpp[System.Type#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cpp/Equals1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.Type#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cs/Equals1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Type#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/vb/Equals1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示了的几个典型功能 。The following example shows a few representative features of . `typeof`Visual Basic) 中的 c # 运算符 (`GetType` 运算符用于获取表示的 对象 。The C# `typeof` operator (`GetType` operator in Visual Basic) is used to get a object representing . 在此 对象中， 方法用于获取， 它表示 采用起始位置和长度的重载。From this object, the method is used to get a representing the overload that takes a starting location and a length. 为了标识重载签名，此代码示例将创建一个临时数组，其中包含两个 表示 `int` `Integer` Visual Basic) 中 (的对象。To identify the overload signature, the code example creates a temporary array containing two objects representing `int` (`Integer` in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 为精确起见，数组包含对 `int` 当前应用程序域中表示的实例的两个引用。To be precise, the array contains two references to the instance of that represents `int` in the current application domain. 对于任何类型， 每个应用程序域只有一个实例。For any type, there is only one instance of per application domain. 此代码示例使用 来对 字符串 "Hello，World！" 调用方法，并显示结果。The code example uses the to invoke the method on the string "Hello, World!", and displays the result. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cs/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/vb/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

span.span: For generic types, the instance describes the assembly that contains the generic type definition, not the assembly that creates and uses a particular constructed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前 对象表示构造泛型类型，则此属性返回包含泛型类型定义的程序集。If the current object represents a constructed generic type, this property returns the assembly that contains the generic type definition. 例如，假设你创建了一个名为 MyGenerics.dll 的程序集，该程序集包含 `MyGenericStack` `MyGenericStack(Of T)` Visual Basic 的) 中的泛型类型定义 (`generic ref class MyGenericStack` 。For example, suppose you create an assembly named MyGenerics.dll that contains the generic type definition `MyGenericStack` (`MyGenericStack(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class MyGenericStack` in C++). 如果在 `MyGenericStack` 另一个程序集中的 Visual Basic) 中创建 (的实例，则构造的 `MyGenericStack(Of Integer)` 类型的属性将返回 表示 MyGenerics.dll 的对象。If you create an instance of `MyGenericStack` (`MyGenericStack(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) in another assembly, the property for the constructed type returns an object that represents MyGenerics.dll. 同样，如果当前 对象表示一个未赋值的泛型参数 `T` ，则此属性返回包含定义的泛型类型的程序集 `T` 。Similarly, if the current object represents an unassigned generic parameter `T`, this property returns the assembly that contains the generic type that defines `T`. 如果该 属性在特定 .net 实现（如 .Net Core 或通用 Windows 平台）上不可用，请改用 属性。If the property is not available on a particular .NET implementation, such as .NET Core or the Universal Windows Platform, use the property instead. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例显示与类关联的程序集名称和该类型的完全限定名称。The following example displays the assembly name associated with the class and the fully qualified name of the type. [!code-cpp[Type_Assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CPP/type_assembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_Assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CS/type_assembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_Assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/VB/type_assembly.vb#1)]

value.span: 的程序集限定名，其中包括从中加载 的程序集的名称；或者为 （如果当前实例表示泛型类型参数）。

span.span: The assembly-qualified name of the , which includes the name of the assembly from which the was loaded, or if the current instance represents a generic type parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类型的程序集限定名称包含类型名称（包括其命名空间），后跟一个逗号，然后是程序集的显示名称。The assembly-qualified name of a type consists of the type name, including its namespace, followed by a comma, followed by the display name of the assembly. 使用属性获取程序集的显示名称 。The display name of an assembly is obtained using the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，处理器体系结构添加到程序集标识，并可指定为程序集名称字符串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 不过，由于兼容性原因，它不包含在由属性返回的字符串中 。However, it is not included in the string returned by the property, for compatibility reasons. 请参阅 。See . 所有支持公共语言运行时的编译器都发出嵌套类的简单名称，并且在查询时，反射将按照以下约定构造错位的名称。All compilers that support the common language runtime emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions. |分隔符Delimiter|含义Meaning| |---------------|-------------| |反斜杠 (\\)Backslash (\\)|转义符。Escape character.| |逗号 (,)Comma (,)|在程序集名称之前。Precedes the Assembly name.| |加号 (+)Plus sign (+)|在嵌套类之前。Precedes a nested class.| |Period (。 ) Period (.)|表示命名空间标识符。Denotes namespace identifiers.| |方括号 ( [] ) Brackets ([])|在类型名称后，表示该类型的数组。After a type name, denotes an array of that type.

- 或 --or-

对于泛型类型，包含泛型类型参数列表。For a generic type, encloses the generic type argument list.

- 或 --or-

在类型参数列表中，包含程序集限定的类型。Within a type argument list, encloses an assembly-qualified type.| 例如，类的程序集限定名称可能如下所示：For example, the assembly-qualified name for a class might look like this: ``` TopNamespace.SubNameSpace.ContainingClass+NestedClass, MyAssembly, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b17a5c561934e089 ``` 如果命名空间包含加号，例如 TopNamespace + 命名空间，则加号 (+) 的前面将有一个转义符 (\\) ，以防止它被解释为嵌套分隔符。If the namespace contained a plus sign, for example TopNamespace.Sub+Namespace, then the plus sign (+) would be preceded by an escape character (\\) to prevent it from being interpreted as a nesting separator. 反射会按如下所示发出此字符串：Reflection would emit this string as follows: ``` TopNamespace.Sub\+Namespace.ContainingClass+NestedClass, MyAssembly, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b17a5c561934e089 ``` "+ +" 变成 " \\ + \\ +"，而 " \\ " 变成 "" \\ \\ 。A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\". 此限定名称可以保留，以后用于加载 。This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the . 若要搜索并加载 ，请将 与类型名称一起使用，或者使用带有程序集限定类型名称的。To search for and load a , use either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name. 只有类型名称才会 在调用方的程序集中查找，然后在系统程序集中查找。 with the type name only will look for the in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly. 具有程序集限定类型名称的将 在任何程序集中查找。 with the assembly qualified type name will look for the in any assembly. 类型名称可能包含表示类型附加信息的尾随字符，如类型是引用类型、指针类型还是数组类型。Type names may include trailing characters that denote additional information about the type, such as whether the type is a reference type, a pointer type or an array type. 若要检索不包含这些尾随字符的类型名称，请使用 `t.GetElementType().ToString()` ，其中 `t` 是类型。To retrieve the type name without these trailing characters, use `t.GetElementType().ToString()`, where `t` is the type. 空格在除程序集名称之外的所有类型名称组件中都是相关的。Spaces are relevant in all type name components except the assembly name. 在程序集名称中，"，" 分隔符前面的空格是相关的，但 "，" 分隔符后面的空格将被忽略。In the assembly name, spaces before the ',' separator are relevant, but spaces after the ',' separator are ignored. 泛型类型的泛型参数本身由程序集名称限定。Generic arguments of generic types are themselves qualified by assembly name. 例如，在 Visual Basic) 中 (的程序集限定类型名称中 `MyGenericClass` `MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` ， `int` 将扩展为的程序集限定类型名称 。For example, in the assembly-qualified type name for `MyGenericClass` (`MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), `int` is expanded to the assembly-qualified type name for . 如果当前 对象表示泛型参数，则此属性返回 `null` 。If the current object represents a generic parameter, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示与类关联的程序集名称和该类型的完全限定名称。The following example displays the assembly name associated with the class and the fully qualified name of the type. [!code-cpp[type_assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CPP/type_assembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CS/type_assembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/VB/type_assembly.vb#1)] 下面的示例将方法返回的字符串 与 、 和属性进行比较 `AssemblyQualifiedName` 。The following example compares the strings returned by the method and the , , and `AssemblyQualifiedName` properties. [!code-csharp[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/cs/fullname1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/vb/fullname1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举的某些成员 是表示一组值的掩码。Some members of the enumeration are masks that represent a group of values. 每个组都包含一个其基础值为零的成员。Each group includes one member whose underlying value is zero. 例如，组中成员的基础值为 零，这与 组中的成员相同 。For example, the underlying value of the member in the group is zero, as is the member in the group. 因此，在测试这些值之前，必须使用掩码。Because of this, you must use the mask before testing for those values. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. > [!TIP] > 大多数情况下， 、和等属性 比类型属性更易于使用。For most purposes, properties like ,, and are easier to use than type attributes. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性返回泛型类型定义的属性。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property returns the attributes of the generic type definition. 例如，在 `MyGenericClass` Visual Basic) 中为 (返回的特性 `MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` 是 `MyGenericClass` `MyGenericClass(Of T)` Visual Basic) 中的 (特性。For example, the attributes returned for `MyGenericClass` (`MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) are the attributes of `MyGenericClass` (`MyGenericClass(Of T)` in Visual Basic). 如果当前 表示泛型类型参数（即，如果属性返回），则 `true` 此属性返回的值是未指定的。If the current represents a generic type parameter - that is, if the property returns `true` - the value returned by this property is unspecified. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性。The following example uses the property. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.attributes/cs/attributes1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.attributes/vb/attributes1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

span.span: Gets the type from which the current directly inherits.

span.span: The from which the current directly inherits, or if the current represents the class or an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类型是当前类型直接从中继承的类型。The base type is the type from which the current type directly inherits. 是唯一没有基类型的类型，因此 `null` 作为的基类型返回 。 is the only type that does not have a base type, therefore `null` is returned as the base type of . 接口从零个或多个基接口继承;因此， `null` 如果该 `Type` 对象表示一个接口，则此属性返回。Interfaces inherit from zero or more base interfaces; therefore, this property returns `null` if the `Type` object represents an interface. 可以通过或确定基接口 。The base interfaces can be determined with or . 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则基类型将反映泛型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, the base type reflects the generic arguments. 以下面的声明为例：For example, consider the following declarations: [!code-cpp[System.Type.BaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.BaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.BaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 对于 `C` Visual Basic) 中构造的类型 (`C(Of Integer)` ，该 属性将返回 `B` 。For the constructed type `C` (`C(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the property returns `B`. 如果当前 表示泛型类型定义的类型参数，则 返回类约束，即类型参数必须继承的类。If the current represents a type parameter of a generic type definition, returns the class constraint, that is, the class the type parameter must inherit. 如果没有类约束，则 返回 。If there is no class constraint, returns . 此属性为只读。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example demonstrates using the property. [!code-cpp[TestBaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestBaseType/CPP/testbasetype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TestBaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestBaseType/CS/testbasetype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TestBaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestBaseType/VB/testbasetype.vb#1)] 下面的示例使用递归列出了在程序集中找到的每个类的完整继承层次结构。The following example uses recursion to list the complete inheritance hierarchy of each class found in an assembly. 该示例定义了一个名为 `C` 的类，该类派生自名为的类 `B` ，而后者又派生自名为的类 `A` 。The example defines a class named `C` that derives from a class named `B`, which, in turn, derives from a class named `A`. [!code-csharp[System.Type.BaseType#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/cs/basetype3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.BaseType#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/vb/basetype3.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 对象是否具有尚未被特定类型替代的类型参数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current object has type parameters that have not been replaced by specific types.

value.span: 如果 对象本身是泛型类型形参或者具有尚未提供特定类型的类型形参，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object is itself a generic type parameter or has type parameters for which specific types have not been supplied; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建类型的实例，在类型本身的类型参数、任何封闭泛型类型或任何类型的元素中都不能有泛型类型定义或开放式构造类型。In order to create an instance of a type, there must be no generic type definitions or open constructed types in the type arguments of the type itself, in any enclosing generic types, or in any elements of the type. 另一种说法是，在递归检查时，类型不能包含泛型类型参数。Another way of saying this is that when examined recursively, the type must contain no generic type parameters. 由于类型可能会很复杂，因此做出此决定非常困难。Since types can be arbitrarily complex, making this determination is difficult. 为方便起见，若要减少出现错误的可能性， 属性提供了一种标准方法来区分封闭式构造类型（可以实例化和开放构造的类型，这是不可能的）。For convenience and to reduce the chance of error, the property provides a standard way to distinguish between closed constructed types, which can be instantiated, and open constructed types, which cannot. 如果 属性返回 `true` ，则无法实例化该类型。If the property returns `true`, the type cannot be instantiated. 属性以递归方式搜索类型参数。The property searches recursively for type parameters. 例如，它 `true` 为元素类型为的数组返回 `A` (`A(Of T)` Visual Basic) 中，即使数组本身不是泛型。For example, it returns `true` for an array whose elements are type `A` (`A(Of T)` in Visual Basic), even though the array is not itself generic. 将此与 为数组返回的属性的行为进行比较 `false` 。Contrast this with the behavior of the property, which returns `false` for arrays. 有关示例类和显示属性值的表 ，请参阅 。For a set of example classes and a table showing the values of the property, see . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有两个类型参数的泛型类，然后定义了第一个派生自第一个类的泛型类。The following example defines a generic class with two type parameters and then defines a second generic class that derives from the first class. 派生类的基类具有两个类型参数：第一个是 ，第二个是派生类型的类型参数。The derived class's base class has two type arguments: the first is and the second is a type parameter of the derived type. 该示例显示有关这些泛型类的信息，包括属性报告的位置 。The example displays information about these generic classes, including the positions reported by the property. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CPP/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明方法是泛型方法定义。The declaring method is a generic method definition. 也就是说，如果不 返回 `null` ，则 `DeclaringMethod.IsGenericMethodDefinition` 返回 `true` 。That is, if does not return `null`, then `DeclaringMethod.IsGenericMethodDefinition` returns `true`. 和 属性标识最初定义泛型类型参数的泛型类型定义或泛型方法定义：The and properties identify the generic type definition or generic method definition in which the generic type parameter was originally defined: - 如果 属性返回，则 表示泛型方法定义，而当前 对象表示泛型方法定义的类型参数。If the property returns a , that represents a generic method definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic method definition. - 如果 属性返回 `null` ，则 属性始终返回 表示泛型类型定义的对象，而当前 对象表示该泛型类型定义的类型参数。If the property returns `null`, then the property always returns a object representing a generic type definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic type definition. - 获取 其 属性引发的类型的属性 `false` 。Getting the property on a type whose property is `false` throws an . 属性返回的 是 泛型方法的，或者是 泛型构造函数的情况下的。The that is returned by the property is either a in the case of a generic method, or a in the case of a generic constructor. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，不支持泛型构造函数。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, generic constructors are not supported. 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个具有泛型方法的类，为该方法分配一个类型自变量，并调用生成的构造泛型方法。The following code example defines a class that has a generic method, assigns a type argument to the method, and invokes the resulting constructed generic method. 它还显示有关泛型方法定义和构造方法的信息。It also displays information about the generic method definition and the constructed method. 显示泛型方法定义的类型参数的信息时，在 `DisplayGenericMethodInfo` 方法中，示例代码显示了 该方法的泛型类型参数的属性值。When displaying information about the type parameters of the generic method definition, in the `DisplayGenericMethodInfo` method, the example code shows the value of the property for the method's generic type parameter. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 获取默认联编程序的引用，该程序实现的内部规则用于选择由 调用的合适成员。

span.span: Gets a reference to the default binder, which implements internal rules for selecting the appropriate members to be called by .

value.span: 系统使用的默认联编程序的引用。

span.span: A reference to the default binder used by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 随公共语言运行时提供的默认联编程序适用于除最特殊的情况以外的所有情况。The default binder provided with the common language runtime is applicable in all but the most specialized circumstances. 如果需要遵循与提供的默认联编程序不同的规则的联编程序，请定义一个派生自类的类型 并使用其中一个重载的参数传递该类型的实例 `binder` 。If you need a binder that follows rules that differ from those of the supplied default binder, define a type derived from the class and pass an instance of that type using the `binder` parameter of one of the overloads. 反射对通用类型系统的可访问性规则建模。Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system. 例如，如果调用方在同一程序集中，则调用方不需要内部成员的特殊权限。For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members. 否则，调用方需要 。Otherwise, the caller needs . 这与查找受保护的、私有的成员等的成员一致。This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on. 一般原则是 只应执行不会丢失数据的扩大转换。The general principle is that should perform only widening conversions, which never lose data. 扩大转换的一个示例是将32位有符号整数的值转换为64位有符号整数的值。An example of a widening conversion is converting a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer. 这与收缩转换不同，后者可能会丢失数据。This is distinguished from a narrowing conversion, which may lose data. 收缩转换的一个示例是将64位有符号整数转换为32位有符号整数。An example of a narrowing conversion is converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer. 下表列出了默认联编程序支持的转换。The following table lists the conversions supported by the default binder. |源类型Source Type|目标类型Target Type| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何类型Any type|其基类型。Its base type.| |任何类型Any type|它实现的接口。The interface it implements.| |CharChar|Unt16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUnt16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |ByteByte|Char、Unt16、Int16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleChar, Unt16, Int16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |SByteSByte|Int16、Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt16, Int32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt16UInt16|UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int16Int16|Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt32UInt32|UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int32Int32|Int64、Single、DoubleInt64, Single, Double| |UInt64UInt64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |Int64Int64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |SingleSingle|DoubleDouble| |非引用Non-reference|按引用。By-reference.| ## Examples 下面的示例从属性获取默认联编 `DefaultBinder` 程序，并通过将 `DefaultBinder` 值作为参数传递给，来调用 MyClass 的成员 。The following example gets the default binder from the `DefaultBinder` property, and invokes a member of MyClass by passing the `DefaultBinder` value as a parameter to . [!code-cpp[Type_DefaultBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_DefaultBinder/CPP/type_defaultbinder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_DefaultBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_DefaultBinder/CS/type_defaultbinder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_DefaultBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_DefaultBinder/VB/type_defaultbinder.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段包含对方法使用的委托的引用 。This field holds a reference to the delegate used by the method. 此委托封装的方法采用两个参数：第一个是 对象，第二个参数是 `Object` 。The method encapsulated by this delegate takes two parameters: the first is a object and the second is an `Object`. 方法确定 `MemberInfo` 对象是否与指定的条件匹配 `Object` 。The method determines whether the `MemberInfo` object matches the criteria specified by the `Object`. `Object`可以为类、或上的任何一个字段分配值 。The `Object` may be assigned the value of any one of the fields on the classes , , or . 例如，可以为 `Object` 指定字段的值， `FieldAttributes` 例如 Public。For example, the `Object` can be assigned the value of a field from `FieldAttributes` such as Public. 在这种情况下，当 `FilterAttribute` 调用委托时，仅当 `true` 对象表示的方法 `MemberInfo` 使用元数据中的公共字段特性修饰时，它才会返回。In that case, when the `FilterAttribute` delegate is invoked, it will return `true` only if the method represented by the `MemberInfo` object is decorated with the public field attribute in metadata. ## Examples 下面的示例获取 `FilterAttribute` 委托，将其作为参数传递给 方法，并显示指定的成员及其属性。The following example gets the `FilterAttribute` delegate, passes it as a parameter to the method, and displays the specified members and their attributes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段包含对方法使用的委托的引用 。This field holds a reference to the delegate used by the method. 此委托封装的方法采用两个参数：第一个是 对象，第二个参数是 `Object` 。The method encapsulated by this delegate takes two parameters: the first is a object and the second is an `Object`. 方法确定 `MemberInfo` 对象是否与指定的条件匹配 `Object` 。The method determines whether the `MemberInfo` object matches the criteria specified by the `Object`. 向 `Object` 分配一个字符串值，该字符串值可能包含尾随 "\*" 通配符。The `Object` is assigned a string value, which may include a trailing "\*" wildcard character. 仅支持通配符结束字符串匹配。Only wildcard end string matching is supported. 例如， `Object` 可以为分配值 "Byte \*"。For example, the `Object` may be assigned the value "Byte\*". 在这种情况下，当 `FilterName` 调用委托时，只有当 `true` 对象表示的方法 `MemberInfo` 具有以 "Byte" 开头的名称时，它才会返回。In that case, when the `FilterName` delegate is invoked, it will return `true` only if the method represented by the `MemberInfo` object has a name that begins with "Byte". ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取与该用户定义类型相关联的方法 `Application` 。The following code example gets the methods associated with the user-defined `Application` type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段包含对方法使用的委托的引用 。This field holds a reference to the delegate used by the method. 此委托封装的方法采用两个参数：第一个是 对象，第二个参数是 `Object` 。The method encapsulated by this delegate takes two parameters: the first is a object and the second is an `Object`. 方法确定 `MemberInfo` 对象是否与指定的条件匹配 `Object` 。The method determines whether the `MemberInfo` object matches the criteria specified by the `Object`. 向 `Object` 分配一个字符串值，该字符串值可能包含尾随 "\*" 通配符。The `Object` is assigned a string value, which may include a trailing "\*" wildcard character. 仅支持通配符结束字符串匹配。Only wildcard end string matching is supported. 例如， `Object` 可以为分配值 "ByTe \*"。For example, the `Object` may be assigned the value "ByTe\*". 在这种情况下， `FilterName` 调用委托时，仅当对象表示的方法 `MemberInfo` 具有以 "byte" 开头的名称时，才返回 true，忽略大小写。In that case, when the `FilterName` delegate is invoked, it will return true only if the method represented by the `MemberInfo` object has a name that begins with "byte", ignoring case. ## Examples 下面的示例获取 `MemberFilter` 委托，将其作为参数传递给 方法，并显示以 `String` 字母 "c" 开头的类的方法及其属性，忽略大小写。The following example gets the `MemberFilter` delegate, passes it as a parameter to the method, and displays the methods and their attributes of the `String` class that begin with the letter "c", disregarding the case. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 类提供的和委托 还可以用来代替 委托。The and delegates supplied by the class may also be used, in lieu of the delegate. 此类实现的所有接口都是在搜索过程中考虑的，无论是由基类还是此类本身来声明。All of the interfaces implemented by this class are considered during the search, whether declared by a base class or this class itself. 此方法搜索基类层次结构，返回每个类实现的每个匹配接口，并返回这些接口中每个接口实现的所有匹配接口 (也就是说，匹配接口的传递闭包将) 返回。This method searches the base class hierarchy, returning each of the matching interfaces each class implements as well as all the matching interfaces each of those interfaces implements (that is, the transitive closure of the matching interfaces is returned). 不返回重复的接口。No duplicate interfaces are returned. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则会 搜索在类型参数上的约束中声明的所有接口，以及通过约束中声明的接口继承的所有接口。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, searches all the interfaces declared in the constraints on the type parameter, and all interfaces inherited through the interfaces declared in the constraints. 如果当前 表示泛型类型的类型参数，则搜索该 类型实现的所有接口，无论它们是否与约束匹配。If the current represents a type argument of a generic type, searches all the interfaces implemented by the type, whether or not they match constraints. > [!NOTE] > 即使在非泛型类型上，也可以返回泛型接口。 can return generic interfaces, even on types that are not generic. 例如，非泛型类型可能 `IEnumerable` `IEnumerable(Of Integer)` 在 Visual Basic) 实现 (。For example, a nongeneric type might implement `IEnumerable` (`IEnumerable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下面的示例查找指定类型实现或继承的指定接口，然后显示接口名称。The following example finds the specified interface implemented or inherited by the specified type, and then displays the interface names. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindInterfaces/CPP/type_findinterfaces.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindInterfaces/CS/type_findinterfaces.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindInterfaces/VB/type_findinterfaces.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 成员包括属性、方法、字段、事件等。Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on. 要使 `FindMembers` 方法成功检索成员信息， `bindingAttr` 参数必须包含至少一个和中的至少 一个 和和 。For the `FindMembers` method to successfully retrieve member information, the `bindingAttr` argument must include at least one of and , along with at least one of and . 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的成员：The following filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search: - 指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 在搜索中包含实例成员。Specify `BindingFlags.Instance` to include instance members in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Static` 在搜索中包含静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.Static` to include static members in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共成员。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) 的非公共成员 (即私有、内部和受保护的成员。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的成员 ，而不搜索简单继承的成员。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the , not members that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 若要使用此方法获取类初始值设定项 (静态构造函数) ， 必须 `Or` 在 Visual Basic) 中指定 | (。To get the class initializer (static constructor) using this method, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 还可以使用属性获取类初始值设定项 。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的类型参数，则会 处理由类约束或类型参数的接口约束声明的任何成员。If the current represents a type parameter of a generic type or generic method, processes any members declared by the class constraint and the interface constraints of the type parameter. `filter`参数可以是类型的自定义委托 ，也可以是以下预定义的委托之一：The `filter` argument can be a custom delegate of type , or it can be one of the following predefined delegates: - ，它使用 、 或 位掩码作为 `filterCriteria` 值。, which uses a, , or bitmask as the `filterCriteria` value. - ，使用传递给的字符串对每个成员名称执行区分大小写的比较 `filterCriteria` 。, which performs a case-sensitive comparison of each member name with the string passed to `filterCriteria`. - ，使用传递给的字符串对每个成员名称执行不区分大小写的比较 `filterCriteria` 。, which performs a case-insensitive comparison of each member name with the string passed to `filterCriteria`. ## Examples 下面的示例查找与指定的搜索条件匹配的类中的所有成员，然后显示匹配的成员。The following example finds all the members in a class that match the specified search criteria, and then displays the matched members. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindMembers/CPP/type_findmembers.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindMembers/CS/type_findmembers.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindMembers/VB/type_findmembers.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，该类型的完全限定名 为 `System.String` 。For example, the fully qualified name of the type is `System.String`. 将此与由属性返回的程序集限定名称 （包括全名和完整程序集名称）进行比较。Contrast this with the assembly-qualified name returned by the property, which consists of the full name plus the full assembly name. 如果当前类型表示封闭式泛型类型，则由属性返回的字符串中的类型参数 由其完整程序集名称限定，即使泛型类型本身的字符串表示形式不是由它的完整程序集名称限定的。If the current type represents a closed generic type, the type arguments in the string returned by the property are qualified by their full assembly name, even though the string representation of the generic type itself is not qualified by its full assembly name. 下面的示例演示了一个类型的 FullName 属性中的差异，该类型表示泛型类型定义，另一个表示封闭式泛型类型。The following example illustrates the difference in the FullName property for a type that represents generic type definition and one that represents a closed generic type. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/fullnameex1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/fullnameex1.vb" id="Snippet2"::: 如果以下情况，此属性将返回 `null` ：This property returns `null` if: - 当前 对象表示泛型类型的类型参数。The current object represents a type parameter of a generic type. 下面的示例检索类型的类型参数 ，并尝试显示其 属性。The following example retrieves the type parameter of the type and attempts to display its property. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/Fullname3.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet3"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/Fullname3.vb" id="Snippet3"::: - 当前 对象表示数组类型、指针类型或 `byref` 基于泛型类型参数的类型。The current object represents an array type, a pointer type, or a `byref` type that is based on a generic type parameter. 下面的示例定义一个泛型类型，其中 `Generictype1` 包含三个方法： `Display(T[])` ，该方法传递了类型为 t; 的数组，该数组 `HandleT(T)` 传递了 t 对象; 和 `ChangeValue(ref T)` ，后者通过引用传递 t 对象。The following example defines a generic type, `Generictype1`, with three methods: `Display(T[])`, which is passed an array of type T; `HandleT(T)`, which is passed a T object; and `ChangeValue(ref T)`, which is passed a T object by reference. 由于 c # 和 Visual Basic 不允许我们将 T 定义为方法中的指针 `HandleT` ，因此，必须对 表示方法的参数类型的对象调用方法，以创建指向泛型类型的指针。Because C# and Visual Basic do not allow us to define T as a pointer in the `HandleT` method, we have to call the method on the object that represents the method's parameter type to create a pointer to a generic type. 该示例的输出显示，在所有三种情况下， 属性为 `null` 。The output from the example shows that in all three cases, the property is `null`. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/Fullname4.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet4"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/FullName4.vb" id="Snippet4"::: - 当前类型包含尚未替换为特定类型的泛型类型参数 (即， 属性返回 `true`) ，但该类型不是泛型类型定义 (也就是说， 属性返回 `false`The current type contains generic type parameters that have not been replaced by specific types (that is, the property returns `true`), but the type is not a generic type definition (that is, the property returns `false` 在下面的示例中， `Derived` 继承自 `Base` 。In the following example, `Derived` inherits from `Base`. 属性获取对象， 该对象表示的基类型 `Derived` ，其 属性返回 `null` 。The property obtains the object that represents the base type of `Derived`, and its property returns `null`. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/Fullname5.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet5"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/FullName5.vb" id="Snippet5"::: 若要获取 不是的 `null` ，可以使用 方法来获取泛型类型定义，如示例中所示。To get a that is not `null`, you can use the method to get the generic type definition, as the example illustrates. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例显示指定类型的全名。The following example displays the full name of the specified type. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestFullName/CPP/TestFullName.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestFullName/CS/testfullname.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestFullName/VB/testfullname.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 下面的示例将方法返回的字符串 与 、 `FullName` 和属性进行比较 。The following example compares the strings returned by the method and the , `FullName`, and properties. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/cs/fullname1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/vb/fullname1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 获取描述当前泛型类型参数的协变和特殊约束的 标志。

span.span: Gets a combination of flags that describe the covariance and special constraints of the current generic type parameter.

value.span: 值的按位组合，用于描述当前泛型类型参数的协变和特殊约束。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that describes the covariance and special constraints of the current generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值包含一些标志，这些标志描述当前泛型类型参数是否是协变的，以及描述任何特殊约束的标志。The value of this property contains flags that describe whether the current generic type parameter is covariant, and flags that describe any special constraints. 使用 值选择协变标志，并使用 值选择约束标志。Use the value to select the covariance flags, and use the value to select the constraint flags. 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了 `Test` 具有两个具有不同约束的类型参数的泛型类型。The following code example defines a generic type `Test` with two type parameters that have different constraints. 当程序执行时，使用 属性和方法检查约束 。When the program executes, the constraints are examined using the property and the method. [!code-cpp[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当 对象表示泛型类型或泛型方法的类型参数时，获取类型参数在声明它的泛型类型或方法的类型参数列表中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the type parameter in the type parameter list of the generic type or method that declared the parameter, when the object represents a type parameter of a generic type or a generic method.

value.span: 类型参数在定义它的泛型类型或方法的类型参数列表中的位置。

span.span: The position of a type parameter in the type parameter list of the generic type or method that defines the parameter.

value.span: 位置编号从 0 开始。

span.span: Position numbers begin at 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回类型参数在最初定义该类型参数的泛型类型定义或泛型方法定义的参数列表中的位置。The property returns the position of a type parameter in the parameter list of the generic type definition or generic method definition where the type parameter was originally defined. 和 属性标识泛型类型或方法定义：The and properties identify the generic type or method definition: - 如果 属性返回，则 表示泛型方法定义，而当前 对象表示泛型方法定义的类型参数。If the property returns a , that represents a generic method definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic method definition. - 如果 属性返回 `null` ，则 属性始终返回 表示泛型类型定义的对象，而当前 对象表示该泛型类型定义的类型参数。If the property returns `null`, then the property always returns a object representing a generic type definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic type definition. 若要为属性的值提供正确的上下文 ，必须标识类型参数所属的泛型类型或方法。To provide the correct context for the value of the property, it is necessary to identify the generic type or method a type parameter belongs to. 例如，请考虑以下代码中泛型方法的返回值 `GetSomething` ：For example, consider the return value of the generic method `GetSomething` in the following code: [!code-cpp[System.Type.GenericParameterPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.genericparameterposition/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GenericParameterPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.genericparameterposition/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GenericParameterPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.genericparameterposition/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 返回的类型 `GetSomething` 取决于提供给类和自身的类型参数 `A` `GetSomething` 。The type returned by `GetSomething` depends on the type arguments supplied to class `A` and to `GetSomething` itself. 你可以获取的 `GetSomething` ，以及可以获取返回类型的。You can obtain a for `GetSomething`, and from that you can obtain the return type. 检查返回类型的类型参数时， 对两者都返回0。When you examine the type parameters of the return type, returns 0 for both. 的位置 `V` 为0，因为 `V` 是类的类型参数列表中的第一个类型参数 `A` 。The position of `V` is 0 because `V` is the first type parameter in the type parameter list for class `A`. 的位置 `X` 为0，因为 `X` 是的类型参数列表中的第一个类型参数 `GetSomething` 。The position of `X` is 0 because `X` is the first type parameter in the type parameter list for `GetSomething`. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前不表示类型参数，则调用属性会导致异常 。Calling the property causes an exception if the current does not represent a type parameter. 检查开放式构造类型的类型参数时，请使用 属性告诉它们是类型参数和类型。When you examine the type arguments of an open constructed type, use the property to tell which are type parameters and which are types. 属性为 `true` 类型参数返回; 您可以使用 方法获取其位置，并使用 和 属性来确定定义它的泛型方法或类型定义。The property returns `true` for a type parameter; you can then use the method to obtain its position and use the and properties to determine the generic method or type definition that defines it. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有两个类型参数的泛型类，并定义了第一个派生自第一个类的泛型类。The following example defines a generic class with two type parameters and defines a second generic class that derives from the first class. 派生类的基类具有两个类型参数：第一个是 ，第二个是派生类型的类型参数。The derived class's base class has two type arguments: the first is , and the second is a type parameter of the derived type. 该示例显示有关这些泛型类的信息，包括属性报告的位置 。The example displays information about these generic classes, including the positions reported by the property. [!code-cpp[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets an array of the generic type arguments for this type.

value.span: 此类型的泛型类型参数的数组。

span.span: An array of the generic type arguments for this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅获取泛型类型参数;也就是说，已为当前类型的泛型类型参数指定的类型。This property gets only the generic type arguments; that is, the types that have been specified for the generic type parameters of the current type. 如果当前类型是泛型类型定义，则此属性返回一个空数组。If the current type is a generic type definition, this property returns an empty array. > [!NOTE] > 如果泛型类型在泛型方法或其他泛型类型中使用，则它的某些泛型类型参数可能是封闭方法或类型的泛型类型参数。If a generic type is used in a generic method or in another generic type, some of its generic type arguments might be generic type parameters of the enclosing method or type. 若要获取表示泛型类型定义的类型的泛型类型参数，请使用 属性。To get the generic type parameters of a type that represents a generic type definition, use the property. 若要获取 当前对象的对象 ，请使用 扩展方法。To get a object for the current object, use the extension method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重载查找公共实例构造函数，并且不能用于获取) (静态构造函数的类初始值设定项。This method overload looks for public instance constructors and cannot be used to obtain a class initializer (static constructor). 若要获取类初始值设定项，请使用采用的重载 ，并指定 `Or` Visual Basic) 中 | (。To get a class initializer, use an overload that takes , and specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 还可以使用属性获取类初始值设定项 。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 如果请求的构造函数是非公共的，则此方法返回 `null` 。If the requested constructor is non-public, this method returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法将始终返回 `null` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method always returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例获取的类型 `MyClass` ，获取 对象，并显示构造函数签名。The following example obtains the type of `MyClass`, gets the object, and displays the constructor signature. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在完全匹配项， `binder` 将尝试强制转换数组中指定的参数类型，以便 `types` 选择匹配项。If an exact match does not exist, the `binder` will attempt to coerce the parameter types specified in the `types` array in order to select a match. 如果 `binder` 无法选择匹配项，则 `null` 返回。If the `binder` is unable to select a match, then `null` is returned. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的构造函数：The following filter flags can be used to define which constructors to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共构造函数。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public constructors in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) 的非公共构造函数 (即私有、内部和受保护的构造函数。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public constructors (that is, private, internal, and protected constructors) in the search. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 若要使用此方法重载获取类初始值设定项 (静态构造函数) ， 必须 `Or` 在 Visual Basic) 中指定 | (。To get the class initializer (static constructor) using this method overload, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 还可以使用属性获取类初始值设定项 。You can also get the class initializer using the property. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法将始终返回 `null` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method always returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的程序获取类的类型 `MyClass1` ，获取与 指定的绑定标志匹配的对象，并显示该构造函数的签名。The following program obtains the type of `MyClass1` class, gets the object matching the specified binding flags, and displays the signature of the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 如果不存在完全匹配项， `binder` 将尝试强制转换数组中指定的参数类型，以便 `types` 选择匹配项。If an exact match does not exist, the `binder` will attempt to coerce the parameter types specified in the `types` array in order to select a match. 如果 `binder` 无法选择匹配项，则 `null` 返回。If the `binder` is unable to select a match, then `null` is returned. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的构造函数：The following filter flags can be used to define which constructors to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共构造函数。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public constructors in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) 的非公共构造函数 (即私有、内部和受保护的构造函数。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public constructors (that is, private, internal, and protected constructors) in the search. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 若要使用此方法获取类初始值设定项 (静态构造函数) ， 必须 `Or` 在 Visual Basic) 中指定 | (。To get the class initializer (static constructor) using this method, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 还可以使用属性获取类初始值设定项 。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法将始终返回 `null` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method always returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例获取的类型 `MyClass1` ，获取 与指定的绑定标志匹配的对象，并显示构造函数签名。The following example obtains the type of `MyClass1`, remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例显示 具有两个实例构造函数和一个静态构造函数的类的重载的输出。This example shows the output of the overload from a class that has two instance constructors and one static constructor. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.GetConstructors Example/CPP/source1.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.GetConstructors Example/CS/source1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.GetConstructors Example/VB/source1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 此代码的输出为：The output of this code is: ```output 2 False False ``` 因为 重载仅使用 和，所以 静态构造函数既不由表达式进行计数，也不由 `for` 计算 `IsStatic` 。Because the overload uses only and , the static constructor is neither counted by the `for` expression nor evaluated by `IsStatic`. 若要查找静态构造函数，请使用 重载，并向其传递 (、、、的逻辑或) ， 如下面的代码示例所示：To find static constructors, use the overload, and pass it the combination (logical OR) of , , , , as shown in the following code example: :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.GetConstructors Example/CPP/source2.cpp" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.GetConstructors Example/CS/source2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.GetConstructors Example/VB/source2.vb" id="Snippet2"::: 输出如下：Now the output is: ```output 3 False True False ```

the order in which constructors are returned, because that order varies. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when remarks.format: ## Remarks `bindingAttr` 可用于指定是只返回公共构造函数还是返回公共和非公共构造函数。`bindingAttr` can be used to specify whether to return only public constructors or both public and non-public constructors. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的构造函数：The following filter flags can be used to define which constructors to include in the search: - `BindingFlags.Static`与一起指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` (静态构造函数) 检索类初始值设定项。Specify `BindingFlags.Static` along with `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to retrieve the class initializer (static constructor). 还可以使用属性获取类初始值设定项 。You can also get the class initializer using the property. - `BindingFlags.Instance`同时指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 和和， `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以检索实例构造函数。Specify `BindingFlags.Instance` along with one or both of `BindingFlags.Public` and `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to retrieve instance constructors. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 方法不按特定顺序（如声明顺序）返回构造函数。The method does not return constructors in a particular order, such as declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于构造函数的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which constructors are returned, because that order varies. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 例如，如果类 `C` 具有 `C(T t1)` `Sub New(ByVal t1 As T)` 在 Visual Basic) 中 (的构造函数，则调用 时将在 `C` Visual Basic) 中的 `C(int t1)` c # (中返回 `Sub New(ByVal t1 As Integer)` 。For example, if class `C` has a constructor `C(T t1)` (`Sub New(ByVal t1 As T)` in Visual Basic), calling on `C` returns a that represents `C(int t1)` in C# (`Sub New(ByVal t1 As Integer)` in Visual Basic). 如果当前 表示泛型类型参数，则该 方法返回空数组。If the current represents a generic type parameter, the method returns an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的事件：The following filter flags can be used to define which events to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共事件。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public events in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) 的非公共事件 (即私有、内部和受保护事件。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public events (that is, private, internal, and protected events) in the search. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的事件 ，而不搜索只是继承的事件。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the events declared on the , not events that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 如果某个事件至少有一个公共方法或访问器，则该事件将被视为 "公共"。An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public. 否则，该事件将被视为私有事件，并且必须使用 Visual Basic 中 | | (，并使用 `Or`) 来合并这些值。Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的事件。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法在类型中搜索名为 "单击" 的公共或非公共事件，该事件不 `static` (`Shared` Visual Basic) 中。The following code example uses the method to search a type for a public or non-public event named "Click" that is not `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). [!code-cpp[Type_GetEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/CPP/type_getevent1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/CS/type_getevent1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/VB/type_getevent1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个事件至少有一个公共方法或访问器，则该事件将被视为 "公共"。An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public. 否则，该事件将被视为私有事件，并且必须使用 Visual Basic 中 | | (，并使用 `Or`) 来合并这些值。Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 方法不按特定顺序返回事件，如字母顺序或声明顺序。The method does not return events in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于事件的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which events are returned, because that order varies. 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的事件。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint. ## Examples 下面的示例获取对象的数组 ，获取类的所有事件 `Button` ，并显示事件名称。The following example obtains an array of objects, gets all the events for a `Button` class, and displays the event names. 若要编译 Visual Basic 示例，请使用以下命令行：To compile the Visual Basic example, remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回字段。The method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于字段的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order varies. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的公共字段。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the public fields of the class constraint. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的用法 `GetFields()` 。The following example shows a use of the `GetFields()` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使 `GetFields(BindingFlags)` 重载成功检索属性信息， `bindingAttr` 参数必须包含至少一个 和 ，以及至少一个 和中 的一个。For the `GetFields(BindingFlags)` overload to successfully retrieve property information, the `bindingAttr` argument must include at least one of and , along with at least one of and . 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的字段：The following filter flags can be used to define which fields to include in the search: - 指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 以包括实例方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Instance` to include instance methods. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Static` 以包括静态方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Static` to include static methods. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包含公共字段。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public fields in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包含搜索中) 的非公共字段 (即私有、内部和受保护字段。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public fields (that is, private, internal, and protected fields) in the search. 仅返回基类的受保护字段和内部字段;不返回基类上的私有字段。Only protected and internal fields on base classes are returned; private fields on base classes are not returned. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. - `BindingFlags.Default`单独指定以返回空 数组。Specify `BindingFlags.Default` alone to return an empty array. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的字段 ，而不搜索只是继承的字段。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the fields declared on the , not fields that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回字段。The method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于字段的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order varies. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的公共字段。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the public fields of the class constraint. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的用法 `GetFields(BindingFlags)` 。The following example shows a use of the `GetFields(BindingFlags)` method. summary.span: 返回表示封闭式泛型类型的类型参数或泛型类型定义的类型参数的 对象的数组。

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the type arguments of a closed generic type or the type parameters of a generic type definition.

returns.span: 表示泛型类型的类型实参的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic type.

returns.span: 如果当前类型不是泛型类型，则返回一个空数组。

span.span: Returns an empty array if the current type is not a generic type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组元素按它们出现在泛型类型的类型参数列表中的顺序返回。The array elements are returned in the order in which they appear in the list of type arguments for the generic type. - 如果当前类型是封闭式构造类型 (即， 属性返回 `false`) ，则方法返回的数组 包含已分配给泛型类型定义的泛型类型参数的类型。If the current type is a closed constructed type (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic type definition. - 如果当前类型是泛型类型定义，则数组包含类型参数。If the current type is a generic type definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果当前类型为开放式构造类型 (即，则 属性返回 `true`) 在该构造类型中，未将特定类型分配给封闭泛型类型或方法的所有类型参数和类型参数，数组同时包含类型和类型参数。If the current type is an open constructed type (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have not been assigned to all of the type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types or methods, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用 属性将它们区分开来。Use the property to tell them apart. 有关此方案的演示，请参阅属性的代码示例 。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example for the property. 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法显示构造类型的类型参数及其泛型类型定义的类型参数。The following code example uses the method to display the type arguments of a constructed type and the type parameters of its generic type definition. 此代码示例是为属性提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. 请参阅示例输出的更大示例。See the larger example for sample output. [!code-cpp[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 返回表示当前泛型类型参数约束的 对象的数组。

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the constraints on the current generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类型参数上的每个约束都表示为一个 对象。Each constraint on a generic type parameter is expressed as a object. 使用 属性来确定约束是否为基类约束; 如果属性返回 `false` ，则约束为接口约束。Use the property to determine whether a constraint is the base class constraint; if the property returns `false`, the constraint is an interface constraint. 如果类型参数没有类约束，并且没有接口约束，则返回空数组。If a type parameter has no class constraint and no interface constraints, an empty array is returned. 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了 `Test` 具有两个具有不同约束的类型参数的泛型类型。The following code example defines a generic type `Test` with two type parameters that have different constraints. 当程序执行时，使用 属性和方法检查约束 。When the program executes, the constraints are examined using the property and the method. summary.span: 返回一个表示可用于构造当前泛型类型的泛型类型定义的 对象。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a generic type definition from which the current generic type can be constructed.

returns.span: 表示可用于构造当前类型的泛型类型的 对象。

span.span: A object representing a generic type from which the current type can be constructed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类型定义是可以从中构造其他类型的模板。A generic type definition is a template from which other types can be constructed. 例如，从泛型类型定义 `G` (用 c # 语法表示; `G(Of T)` 在 Visual Basic 或 `generic ref class G` c + + 中) ，可以在 `G` Visual Basic) 中构造和实例化类型 (`G(Of Integer)` 。For example, from the generic type definition `G` (expressed in C# syntax; `G(Of T)` in Visual Basic or `generic ref class G` in C++) you can construct and instantiate the type `G` (`G(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic). 给定 表示此构造类型的对象， 方法返回泛型类型定义。Given a object representing this constructed type, the method returns the generic type definition. 如果两种构造类型是使用相同的类型参数从同一泛型类型定义创建的，则该 方法将 为这两种类型返回相同的对象。If two constructed types are created from the same generic type definition, using the same type arguments, the method returns the same object for both types. 如果在 已表示泛型类型定义的对象上调用方法，则它将返回当前 。If you call the method on a object that already represents a generic type definition, it returns the current . > [!IMPORTANT] > 泛型类型的数组本身不是泛型。An array of generic types is not itself generic. 在 c # 代码 `A[] v;` 或 Visual Basic 代码中 `Dim v() As A(Of Integer)` ，变量的类型 `v` 不是泛型。In the C# code `A[] v;` or the Visual Basic code `Dim v() As A(Of Integer)`, the type of variable `v` is not generic. 用于 在调用之前确定类型是否为泛型 。Use to determine whether a type is generic before calling . 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用普通实例创建创建构造类型的实例，然后使用 和 方法检索构造类型和泛型类型定义。The following code example creates an instance of a constructed type by using ordinary instance creation and then uses the and methods to retrieve the constructed type and the generic type definition. 此示例使用泛型 类型; 构造类型表示 `Test` 具有字符串键的对象的。This example uses the generic type; the constructed type represents a of `Test` objects with string keys. [!code-cpp[System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索接口约束以及从类或接口约束继承的任何接口。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the interface constraints and any interfaces inherited from class or interface constraints. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型接口， `name` 参数为错位名称，以抑音符 (\`) 和类型参数的数目结尾。For generic interfaces, the `name` parameter is the mangled name, ending with a grave accent (\`) and the number of type parameters. 这对于泛型接口定义和构造泛型接口都是如此。This is true for both generic interface definitions and constructed generic interfaces. 例如，若要查找 `IExample` `IExample(Of T)` Visual Basic) 中 Visual Basic) 或 `IExample` (中的 (`IExample(Of String)` ，请搜索 ``"IExample`1"`` 。For example, to find `IExample` (`IExample(Of T)` in Visual Basic) or `IExample` (`IExample(Of String)` in Visual Basic), search for ``"IExample`1"``. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法在 类中搜索 接口，并列出接口的方法。The following code example uses the method to search the class for the interface, and lists the methods of the interface. 此代码示例还演示了 方法重载和 方法。The code example also demonstrates the method overload and the method.
