remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 `ignoreCase` 参数仅适用于简单接口名称，而不适用于命名空间。The `ignoreCase` parameter applies only to the simple interface name, not to the namespace. `name`指定命名空间的部分必须具有正确的大小写，否则将找不到该接口。The portion of `name` that specifies the namespace must have the correct case, or the interface will not be found. 例如，字符串 "system.icomparable" 查找 接口，但字符串 "system.icomparable" 不会。For example, the string "System.icomparable" finds the interface, but the string "system.icomparable" does not. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索接口约束以及从类或接口约束继承的任何接口。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the interface constraints and any interfaces inherited from class or interface constraints. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型接口， `name` 参数为错位名称，以抑音符 (\`) 和类型参数的数目结尾。For generic interfaces, the `name` parameter is the mangled name, ending with a grave accent (\`) and the number of type parameters. 这对于泛型接口定义和构造泛型接口都是如此。This is true for both generic interface definitions and constructed generic interfaces. 例如，若要查找 `IExample` `IExample(Of T)` Visual Basic) 中 Visual Basic) 或 `IExample` (中的 (`IExample(Of String)` ，请搜索 `"IExample` "1"。For example, to find `IExample` (`IExample(Of T)` in Visual Basic) or `IExample` (`IExample(Of String)` in Visual Basic), search for `"IExample`1"\`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法为接口执行不区分大小写的类搜索 。The following code example uses the method to perform a case-insensitive search of the class for the interface. 此代码示例还演示了 方法重载和 方法。The code example also demonstrates the method overload and the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口映射表示接口如何映射到实现该接口的类上的实际成员。The interface map denotes how an interface is mapped into the actual members on a class that implements that interface. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则在此方法返回的的元素中，类型参数将替换为相应的类型参数 。If the current represents a constructed generic type, type parameters are replaced by the appropriate type arguments in the elements of the returned by this method. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法来确定 接口如何映射到 方法，以及 接口如何映射到 属性。The following example calls the method to determine how the interface maps to methods, and how the interface maps to properties. 请注意，由于 接口定义了一组属性，因此，返回的 对象 为属性的 get 和 set 访问器包含单独的对象。Note that, because the interface defines a set of properties, the returned object includes separate objects for a property's get and set accessors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回接口。The method does not return interfaces in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于接口的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which interfaces are returned, because that order varies. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索接口约束以及从类或接口约束继承的任何接口。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the interface constraints and any interfaces inherited from class or interface constraints. ## Examples 下面的示例获取指定类的类型并显示该类型实现或继承的所有接口。The following example gets the type of the specified class and displays all the interfaces that the type implements or inherits. 若要编译 Visual Basic 示例，请使用以下编译器命令：To compile the Visual Basic example, use the following compiler commands: `vbc type_getinterfaces1.vb /r:System.Web.dll /r:System.dll` [!code-cpp[Type_GetInterfaces1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetInterfaces1/CPP/type_getinterfaces1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetInterfaces1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetInterfaces1/CS/type_getinterfaces1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetInterfaces1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetInterfaces1/VB/type_getinterfaces1.vb#1)]

hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的成员，或者如果没有类约束，则搜索的成员 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMember("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示 `String` 以字母 C 开头的类的所有成员。The following example displays all the members of the `String` class that start with the letter C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 成员包括属性、方法、字段、事件等。Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on. 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回成员。The method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于成员的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的成员：The following filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共成员。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) 的非公共成员 (即私有、内部和受保护的成员。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的成员 ，而不搜索简单继承的成员。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the , not members that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 若要使用此方法重载获取类初始值设定项 (静态构造函数) ，必须为指定 "静态构造函数" `name` ，并 `Or` 在 Visual Basic) 中为 | (`bindingAttr` 。To get the class initializer (static constructor) using this method overload, you must specify "static constructor" for `name`, and | (`Or` in Visual Basic) for `bindingAttr`. 还可以使用属性获取类初始值设定项 。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的成员，或者如果没有类约束，则搜索的成员 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMember("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示 `myString` 以字母 C 开头的类的所有公共静态成员。The following example displays all the public static members of the `myString` class that start with the letter C. private methods on base classes are not returned. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; remarks.format: ## Remarks 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例方法。The search includes public static and public instance methods. 如果重载了方法并且有多个公共方法，该方法将 引发 异常。If a method is overloaded and has more than one public method, the method throws an exception. 在下面的示例中，引发了异常，因为有多个方法的公共重载 。In the following example, an exception is thrown because there is more than one public overload of the method. 另一方面，因为 `Person.ToString` 方法会重写， 因此不会重载，所以 方法可以检索 对象。On the other hand, because the `Person.ToString` method overrides and therefore is not overloaded, the method is able to retrieve the object. [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetMethod#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Type.GetMethod/cs/GetMethodWithOverloads2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetMethod#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Type.GetMethod/vb/GetMethodWithOverloads2.vb#3)] 可以执行以下操作之一来检索特定方法：You can do one of the following to retrieve a specific method: - 调用 方法，并指定 `bindingAttr` 唯一标识该方法的参数。Call the method and specify a `bindingAttr` argument that uniquely identifies the method. 例如，如果由于类型具有静态和实例重载而引发异常，则可以指定 `bindingAttr` 的参数 `Or` 。For example, if the exception is thrown because a type has a static and an instance overload, you can specify a `bindingAttr` argument of `Or`. - 调用 包含参数的方法的重载，该 `types` 参数定义方法的参数的类型。Call an overload of the method that includes a `types` parameter which defines the types of the method's parameters. - 调用 方法以检索包含属于某个类型的所有公共方法的数组。Call the method to retrieve an array containing all of the public methods belonging to a type. 然后，你可以对其进行循环访问以识别名为的重复方法 `name` 。You can then iterate it to identify the duplicate methods named `name`. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMember("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. ## Examples 下面的示例获取名为的方法 `MethodA` 。The following example gets a method named `MethodA`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的方法：The following filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search: - 必须指定 或 才能获取返回。You must specify either or in order to get a return. - 指定 在搜索中包含公共方法。Specify to include public methods in the search. - 指定 以包括搜索中) (的非公共方法，即私有、内部和受保护的方法。Specify to include non-public methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search. - 指定在 `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。 to ignore the case of `name`. - 仅搜索在上声明的方法 ，而不搜索简单继承的方法。 to search only the methods declared on the , not methods that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 如果重载方法，并且多个重载满足参数所指定的约束 `bindingAttr` ，则该方法将引发 异常。If a method is overloaded and more than one overload meets the constraints specified by the `bindingAttr` argument, the method throws an exception. 在下面的示例中，引发了异常，因为：In the following example, an exception is thrown because: - 该 `TestClass` 类型具有两个方法的公共实例重载 `DisplayValue` ： `DisplayValue(String)` 和 `DisplayValue(String, Object[])` 。The `TestClass` type has two public instance overloads of the `DisplayValue` method, `DisplayValue(String)` and `DisplayValue(String, Object[])`. - 此 `TestClass` 类型具有方法的两个公共实例重载 `Equals` ，其中一个派生自 ： `Equals(TestClass)` 和 `Equals(Object)` 。The `TestClass` type has two public instance overloads of the `Equals` method, one of which is inherited from : `Equals(TestClass)` and `Equals(Object)`. [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetMethod#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Type.GetMethod/cs/GetMethodWithOverloads1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetMethod#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Type.GetMethod/vb/GetMethodWithOverloads1.vb#2)] 可以执行以下操作之一来检索特定方法：You can do one of the following to retrieve a specific method: - 更改绑定约束。Change the binding constraints. 在前面的示例中，尝试检索 `Equals` 由类型声明的公共实例方法，而不是成功检索 `Equals(TestClass)` 。In the previous example, attempting to retrieve a public instance `Equals` method that is declared by the type and not inherited successfully retrieves `Equals(TestClass)`. - 调用 包含参数的方法的重载，该 `types` 参数定义方法的参数的类型。Call an overload of the method that includes a `types` parameter which defines the types of the method's parameters. - 调用 方法以检索一个数组，该数组包含属于具有指定绑定特性的类型的所有方法。Call the method to retrieve an array containing all of the methods belonging to a type that have the specified binding attributes. 然后，你可以对其进行循环访问以识别名为的重复方法 `name` 。You can then iterate it to identify the duplicate methods named `name`. 此方法在上一个示例的异常处理程序中进行了说明 。This approach is illustrated in the previous example's handler for the exception. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMember("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. ## Examples 下面的示例获取与指定的绑定标志匹配的方法。The following example gets the method that matches the specified binding flags. [!code-cpp[Type_GetMethod2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod2/CPP/type_getmethod2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetMethod2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod2/CS/type_getmethod2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetMethod2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod2/VB/type_getmethod2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例方法。The search includes public static and public instance methods. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > `name`参数不能包括类型参数。The `name` parameter cannot include type arguments. 例如，c # 代码 `GetMethod("MyGenericMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的方法 `MyGenericMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型的泛型参数的名为的方法 `MyGenericMethod` `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMethod("MyGenericMethod")` searches for a method with the text name "`MyGenericMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyGenericMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. 应将 `GetMethod("MyGenericMethod")` 与数组中的相应参数一起使用 `types` 。Instead, use `GetMethod("MyGenericMethod")` with the appropriate parameter in the `types` array. ## Examples 下面的示例查找的特定重载 `MethodA` ，并指定各种参数类型。The following example finds specific overloads of `MethodA`, specifying a variety of argument types. > [!NOTE] > 该 [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] 示例需要 `/unsafe` 编译器选项。The [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] example requires the `/unsafe` compiler option. [!code-cpp[Type_GetMethod4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod4/CPP/type_getmethod4.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetMethod4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod4/CS/type_getmethod4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetMethod4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod4/VB/type_getmethod4.vb#1)] 下面的示例检索 对象，该对象表示 `Add` (类) 的非泛型类型的方法 、类) (开放式泛型类型 以及 (该类型的封闭式泛型类型 `List(Of String)` 。The following example retrieves objects that represent the `Add` methods of a non-generic type (the class), an open generic type (the class), and a closed generic type (the `List(Of String)` type. [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Type.GetMethod/cs/GetMethod1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Type.GetMethod/vb/GetMethod1.vb#1)] 该示例定义了一个 `GetAddMethod` 检索相应对象的 方法。The example defines a `GetAddMethod` method that retrieves the appropriate object. 为了提供 `types` 开放式泛型类型的参数，它将调用 方法。To provide the `types` argument for an open generic type, it calls the method. 为提供 `types` 封闭式泛型类型的参数，它将检索属性的值 。To provide the `types` argument for a closed generic type, it retrieves the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例方法。The search includes public static and public instance methods. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMethod("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMethod("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. 应将 `GetMethod("MyMethod")` 与数组中的相应参数一起使用 `types` 。Instead, use `GetMethod("MyMethod")` with the appropriate parameter in the `types` array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的方法：The following filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包含公共方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) (的非公共方法，即私有、内部和受保护的方法。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include nonpublic methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的方法 ，而不搜索简单继承的方法。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the , not methods that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMember("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. ## Examples 下面的示例查找的特定重载 `MethodA` ，并指定绑定约束和各种参数类型。The following example finds specific overloads of `MethodA`, specifying binding constraints and a variety of argument types. > [!NOTE] > 该 [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] 示例需要 `/unsafe` 编译器选项。The [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] example requires the `/unsafe` compiler option. [!code-cpp[Type_GetMethod5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod5/CPP/type_getmethod5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetMethod5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod5/CS/type_getmethod5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetMethod5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethod5/VB/type_getmethod5.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 下表显示了 `GetXXX` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `GetXXX` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的方法：The following filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包含公共方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) (的非公共方法，即私有、内部和受保护的方法。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include nonpublic methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的方法 ，而不搜索简单继承的方法。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the , not methods that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 对于泛型方法，请不要在中包括类型参数 `name` 。For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`. 例如，c # 代码将 `GetMember("MyMethod")` 搜索文本名称为 "" 的成员 `MyMethod` ，而不是使用一个类型为的 `MyMethod` 泛型参数的名为的方法 `int` 。For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`. ## Examples 下面的示例查找的特定重载 `MethodA` ，指定绑定约束、调用约定和各种参数类型。The following example finds specific overloads of `MethodA`, specifying binding constraints, calling conventions, and a variety of argument types. > [!NOTE] > 该 [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] 示例需要 `/unsafe` 编译器选项。The [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] example requires the `/unsafe` compiler option. remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 如果 `types` 为 `null`，则自变量不匹配。If `types` is `null`, arguments are not matched. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的方法：The following filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包含公共方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) (的非公共方法，即私有、内部和受保护的方法。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的方法 ，而不搜索简单继承的方法。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the , not methods that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回方法。The method does not return methods in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于方法的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which methods are returned, because that order varies. 构造函数不包含在此调用所返回的方法的数组中。Constructors are not included in the array of methods returned by this call. 单独调用以 `GetConstructors()` 获取构造函数方法。Make a separate call to `GetConstructors()` to get the constructor methods. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. > [!NOTE] > 在查找构造函数和方法时，不能忽略参数。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 在调用时，只能省略参数。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使 `GetMethods(BindingFlags)` 重载成功检索方法信息， `bindingAttr` 参数必须包含至少一个和中的至少一个和 和 。For the `GetMethods(BindingFlags)` overload to successfully retrieve method information, the `bindingAttr` argument must include at least one of and , along with at least one of and . 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的方法：The following filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search: - 指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 以包括实例方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Instance` to include instance methods. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Static` 以包括静态方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Static` to include static methods. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包含公共方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) (的非公共方法，即私有、内部和受保护的方法。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search. 仅返回基类的受保护方法和内部方法;不返回基类上的私有方法。Only protected and internal methods on base classes are returned; private methods on base classes are not returned. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. - `BindingFlags.Default`单独指定以返回空 数组。Specify `BindingFlags.Default` alone to return an empty array. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的方法 ，而不搜索简单继承的方法。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the , not methods that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回方法。The method does not return methods in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖于方法的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which methods are returned, because that order varies. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的方法，如果没有类约束，则搜索的方法 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of if there is no class constraint. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有两个公共方法和一个受保护方法的类，创建与 `Type` 对应的对象 `MyTypeClass` ，获取所有公共和非公共方法，并显示它们的名称。The following example creates a class with two public methods and one protected method, creates a `Type` object corresponding to `MyTypeClass`, gets all public and non-public methods, and displays their names. [!code-cpp[Type_GetMethods2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethods2/CPP/type_getmethods2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetMethods2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethods2/CS/type_getmethods2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetMethods2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetMethods2/VB/type_getmethods2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 使用嵌套类的简单名称 `name` 。Use the simple name of the nested class for `name`. 不要将其与外部类的名称限定。Do not qualify it with the name of the outer class. 对于泛型嵌套类，请使用错位的名称-即，追加一个重音符和泛型参数的数目。For a generic nested class, use the mangled name - that is, append a grave accent and the number of generic arguments. 例如，使用字符串 "内部 \` 1" 获取 `Inner` Visual Basic) 中的泛型嵌套类 (`Inner(Of T)` 。For example, use the string "Inner\`1" to get the generic nested class `Inner` (`Inner(Of T)` in Visual Basic). 不要包含类型参数的特定于语言的语法。Do not include language-specific syntax for type parameters. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的嵌套类型。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the nested types of the class constraint. 如果嵌套类型是泛型类型，则此方法返回其泛型类型定义。If a nested type is generic, this method returns its generic type definition. 即使封闭泛型类型是封闭式构造类型，也是如此。This is true even if the enclosing generic type is a closed constructed type. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前 表示在 c #、Visual Basic 或 c + + 中定义的泛型类型，则它的嵌套类型都是通用的，即使它们不具有自己的泛型参数也是如此。If the current represents a generic type defined in C#, Visual Basic, or C++, its nested types are all generic even if they have no generic parameters of their own. 这不一定适用于动态程序集中定义的嵌套类型或用 [Ilasm.exe (IL 汇编程序) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler)进行编译的。This is not necessarily true of nested types defined in dynamic assemblies or compiled with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler). 有关嵌套泛型类型以及如何从其泛型类型定义构造嵌套的泛型类型的信息，请参阅 。For information on nested generic types, and on constructing nested generic types from remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用嵌套类的简单名称 `name` 。Use the simple name of the nested class for `name`. 不要将其与外部类的名称限定。Do not qualify it with the name of the outer class. 对于泛型嵌套类，请使用错位的名称-即，追加一个重音符和泛型参数的数目。For a generic nested class, use the mangled name - that is, append a grave accent and the number of generic parameters. 例如，使用字符串 "内部 \` 1" 获取 `Inner` Visual Basic) 中的泛型嵌套类 (`Inner(Of T)` 。For example, use the string "Inner\`1" to get the generic nested class `Inner` (`Inner(Of T)` in Visual Basic). 不要包含类型参数的特定于语言的语法。Do not include language-specific syntax for type parameters. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的嵌套类型：The following filter flags can be used to define which nested types to include in the search: - 必须指定 或 才能获取返回。You must specify either or to get a return. - 指定 在搜索中包括公共嵌套类型。Specify to include public nested types in the search. - 指定 以包含搜索中) 的非公共嵌套类型 (即，private、internal 和 protected 嵌套类型。Specify to include non-public nested types (that is, private, internal, and protected nested types) in the search. 此方法只返回当前类型的嵌套类型。This method returns only the nested types of the current type. 它不会搜索当前类型的基类。It does not search the base classes of the current type. 若要查找嵌套在基类中的类型，必须遍历继承层次结构，并 在每个级别调用。To find types that are nested in base classes, you must walk the inheritance hierarchy, calling at each level. 和 将被忽略。 and are ignored. 仅用 标志或标志调用此方法 将返回指定的嵌套类型，并且不需要任何其他标志。Calling this method with only the flag or only the flag will return the specified nested types and does not require any other flags. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的嵌套类型。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the nested types of the class constraint. 如果嵌套类型是泛型类型，则此方法返回其泛型类型定义。If a nested type is generic, this method returns its generic type definition. 即使封闭泛型类型是封闭式构造类型，也是如此。This is true even if the enclosing generic type is a closed constructed type. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前 表示在 c #、Visual Basic 或 c + + 中定义的泛型类型，则它的嵌套类型都是通用的，即使它们不具有自己的泛型参数也是如此。If the current represents a generic type defined in C#, Visual Basic, or C++, its nested types are all generic even if they have no generic parameters of their own. 这不一定适用于动态程序集中定义的嵌套类型或用 [Ilasm.exe (IL 汇编程序) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler)进行编译的。This is not necessarily true of nested types defined in dynamic assemblies or compiled with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler). 有关嵌套泛型类型以及如何从其泛型类型定义构造嵌套的泛型类型的信息，请参阅 。For information on nested generic types, and on constructing nested generic types from their generic type definitions, see .

as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的属性。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `GetProperties` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `GetProperties` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使 `GetProperties(BindingFlags)` 重载成功检索属性信息， `bindingAttr` 参数必须包含至少一个 和 ，以及至少一个 和中 的一个。For the `GetProperties(BindingFlags)` overload to successfully retrieve property information, the `bindingAttr` argument must include at least one of and , along with at least one of and . 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的属性：The following filter flags can be used to define which properties to include in the search: - 指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 以包括实例方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Instance` to include instance methods. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Static` 以包括静态方法。Specify `BindingFlags.Static` to include static methods. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共属性。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public properties in the search. 如果某个属性至少具有一个公共访问器，则该属性将被视为 "公共"。A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) (的非公共属性，即私有、内部和受保护的属性。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public properties (that is, private, internal, and protected properties) in the search. 仅返回基类的受保护的和内部属性;不返回基类上的私有属性。Only protected and internal properties on base classes are returned; private properties on base classes are not returned. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. - `BindingFlags.Default`单独指定以返回空 数组。Specify `BindingFlags.Default` alone to return an empty array. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的属性 ，而不搜索仅继承的属性。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the properties declared on the , not properties that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 方法不按特定顺序（如字母顺序或声明顺序）返回属性。The method does not return properties in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 你的代码不能依赖属性的返回顺序，因为该顺序会有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which properties are returned, because that order varies. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法返回 类型参数替换为相应类型参数的对象。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的属性。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个名为 `PropertyClass` 的类，该类包含六个属性：两个是公共的，一个是专用的，一个是私有的，一个是受保护的，其中一个是内部 (`Friend` Visual Basic) ，另一个是 `Protected Friend` Visual Basic) 中的 (受保护The following example defines a class named `PropertyClass` that includes six properties: two are public, one is private, one is protected, one is internal (`Friend` in Visual Basic), and one is protected internal (`Protected Friend` in Visual Basic). 然后，它会显示一些基本属性信息 (属性名称和类型、是否为读/写以及与 `get` `set` 指定绑定约束匹配的属性的) 和访问器的可见性。It then displays some basic property information (the property name and type, whether it is read/write, and the visibility of its `get` and `set` accessors) for the properties that match the specified binding constraints. :::code language="cpp" remarks.format: ## Remarks 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例属性。The search includes public static and public instance properties. 如果某个属性至少具有一个公共访问器，则该属性将被视为 "公共"。A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public. 否则，该属性将被视为私有属性，并且必须使用 Visual Basic 中 | | (，并使用 `Or`) 来合并这些值。Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的属性。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint. 出现这种情况的情况 如下所示：Situations in which occurs include the following: - 类型包含两个具有相同名称但参数数目不同的索引属性。A type contains two indexed properties that have the same name but different numbers of parameters. 若要解决多义性，请使用方法的重载， 该重载指定参数类型。To resolve the ambiguity, use an overload of the method that specifies parameter types. - 派生类型声明一个属性，该属性通过使用 `new` Visual Basic) 中的修饰符 (隐藏同名的继承属性 `Shadows` 。A derived type declares a property that hides an inherited property with the same name, by using the `new` modifier (`Shadows` in Visual Basic). 若要解决多义性问题，请使用 方法重载并添加 标志，以将搜索限制为未继承的成员。To resolve the ambiguity, use the method overload and add the flag to restrict the search to members that are not inherited. ## 索引器和默认属性Indexers and Default Properties [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]、 [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] 具有用于访问索引属性的简化语法，并允许一个索引属性作为其类型的默认值。, [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] have simplified syntax for accessing indexed properties and allow one indexed property to be a default for its type. 例如，如果变量 `myList` 引用为 ，则 `myList[3]` `myList(3)` Visual Basic) 中 (语法将检索索引为3的元素。For example, if the variable `myList` refers to an , the syntax `myList[3]` (`myList(3)` in Visual Basic) retrieves the element with the index of 3. 可以重载属性。You can overload the property. 在 c # 中，此功能称为索引器，不能按名称引用。In C#, this feature is called an indexer and cannot be referred to by name. 默认情况下，c # 索引器在元数据中显示为名为 "Item" 的索引属性。By default, a C# indexer appears in metadata as an indexed property named "Item". 但是，类库开发人员可以使用 属性来更改元数据中索引器的名称。However, a class library developer can use the attribute to change the name of the indexer in the metadata. 例如， 类具有一个名为的索引器 。For example, the class has an indexer named . 使用 c # 以外的语言创建的索引属性也可以包含除 Item 以外的其他名称。Indexed properties created using languages other than C# can have names other than Item, as well. 若要确定某一类型是否具有默认属性，请使用 方法测试该 特性。To determine whether a type has a default property, use the method to test for the attribute. 如果类型具有 ，则 属性将返回默认属性的名称。If the type has , the property returns the name of the default property. ## Examples 下面的示例检索 `Type` 用户定义的类的对象，检索该类的属性，并显示属性名称。The following example retrieves the `Type` object of a user-defined class, retrieves a property of that class, and displays the property name. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetProperty1/CPP/type_getproperty1.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetProperty1/CS/type_getproperty1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetProperty1/VB/type_getproperty1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 在内部，在元数据中，名称为 "Item"。Internally, this property is referred to in the metadata by the name "Item." 尝试 `PropertyInfo` 使用反射必须指定此内部名称，才能正确返回 `PropertyInfo` 属性。Any attempt to get `PropertyInfo` using reflection must specify this internal name in order to correctly return the `PropertyInfo` property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个属性至少具有一个公共访问器，则该属性将被视为 "公共"。A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public. 否则，该属性将被视为私有属性，并且必须使用 Visual Basic 中 | | (，并使用 `Or`) 来合并这些值。Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例属性。The search includes public static and public instance properties. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的属性。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint. ## 索引器和默认属性Indexers and Default Properties [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]、 [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] 具有用于访问索引属性的简化语法，并允许一个索引属性作为其类型的默认值。, [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] have simplified syntax for accessing indexed properties and allow one indexed property to be a default for its type. 例如，如果变量 `myList` 引用为 ，则 `myList[3]` `myList(3)` Visual Basic) 中 (语法将检索索引为3的元素。For example, if the variable `myList` refers to an , the syntax `myList[3]` (`myList(3)` in Visual Basic) retrieves the element with the index of 3. 可以重载属性。You can overload the property. 在 c # 中，此功能称为索引器，不能按名称引用。In C#, this feature is called an indexer and cannot be referred to by name. 默认情况下，c # 索引器在元数据中显示为名为 "Item" 的索引属性。By default, a C# indexer appears in metadata as an indexed property named "Item". 但是，类库开发人员可以使用 属性来更改元数据中索引器的名称。However, a class library developer can use the attribute to change the name of the indexer in the metadata. 例如， 类具有一个名为的索引器 。For example, the class has an indexer named . 使用 c # 以外的语言创建的索引属性也可以包含除 Item 以外的其他名称。Indexed properties created using languages other than C# can have names other than Item, as well. 若要确定某一类型是否具有默认属性，请使用 方法测试该 特性。To determine whether a type has a default property, use the method to test for the attribute. 如果类型具有 ，则 属性将返回默认属性的名称。If the type has , the property returns the name of the default property. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个具有一个属性的类，并检索属性的名称和类型。The following example defines a class with one property and retrieves the name and type of the property. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetProperty_Types/CPP/type_getproperty_types.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetProperty_Types/CS/type_getproperty_types.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetProperty_Types/VB/type_getproperty_types.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个属性至少具有一个公共访问器，则该属性将被视为 "公共"。A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public. 否则，该属性将被视为私有属性，并且必须使用 Visual Basic 中 | | (，并使用 `Or`) 来合并这些值。Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 的搜索 `name` 区分大小写。The search for `name` is case-sensitive. 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例属性。The search includes public static and public instance properties. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的属性。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个属性至少具有一个公共访问器，则该属性将被视为 "公共"。A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public. 否则，该属性将被视为私有属性，并且必须使用 Visual Basic 中 | | (，并使用 `Or`) 来合并这些值。Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 尽管默认的联编程序不处理 (的 `modifiers` 参数) ，但您可以使用抽象 类编写处理的自定义联编程序 `modifiers` 。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 仅在通过 COM 互操作进行调用时使用，并且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 以下 筛选器标志可用于定义要包括在搜索中的属性：The following filter flags can be used to define which properties to include in the search: - 必须指定 `BindingFlags.Instance` 或 `BindingFlags.Static` 才能获取返回。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定 `BindingFlags.Public` 在搜索中包括公共属性。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public properties in the search. - 指定 `BindingFlags.NonPublic` 以包括搜索中) (的非公共属性，即私有、内部和受保护的属性。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public properties (that is, private, internal, and protected properties) in the search. - 指定在 `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` `public` `protected` 层次结构中包含和静态成员; `private` 不包括继承类中的静态成员。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 以下 修饰符标志可用于更改搜索的工作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 如果忽略，则为 `name` 。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 仅搜索在上声明的属性 ，而不搜索仅继承的属性。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the properties declared on the , not properties that were simply inherited. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此方法将返回， 并将类型参数替换为相应的类型参数。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法会搜索类约束的属性。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint. ## 索引器和默认属性Indexers and Default Properties [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]、 [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] 具有用于访问索引属性的简化语法，并允许一个索引属性作为其类型的默认值。, [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] have simplified syntax for accessing indexed properties and allow one indexed property to be a default for its type. 例如，如果变量 `myList` 引用为 ，则 `myList[3]` `myList(3)` Visual Basic) 中 (语法将检索索引为3的元素。For example, if the variable `myList` refers to an , the syntax `myList[3]` (`myList(3)` in Visual Basic) retrieves the element with the index of 3. 可以重载属性。You can overload the property. 在 c # 中，此功能称为索引器，不能按名称引用。In C#, this feature is called an indexer and cannot be referred to by name. 默认情况下，c # 索引器在元数据中显示为名为 "Item" 的索引属性。By default, a C# indexer appears in metadata as an indexed property named "Item". 但是，类库开发人员可以使用 属性来更改元数据中索引器的名称。However, a class library developer can use the attribute to change the name of the indexer in the metadata. 例如， 类具有一个名为的索引器 。For example, the class has an indexer named . 使用 c # 以外的语言创建的索引属性也可以包含除 Item 以外的其他名称。Indexed properties created using languages other than C# can have names other than Item, as well. 若要确定某一类型是否具有默认属性，请使用 方法测试该 特性。To determine whether a type has a default property, use the method to test for the attribute. 如果类型具有 ，则 属性将返回默认属性的名称。If the type has , the property returns the name of the default property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果知道程序集限定名称（可从获取），则可以使用方法获取其他程序集中的类型的对象 。You can use the method to obtain a object for a type in another assembly if you know its assembly-qualified name, which can be obtained from . 导致加载中指定的程序集 `typeName` 。 causes loading of the assembly specified in `typeName`. 您还可以使用方法加载程序集 ，然后使用 或 方法来获取 对象。You can also load an assembly using the method, and then use the or method to get objects. 如果某个类型位于您的程序在编译时已知的程序集中，则在 Visual Basic 中使用 `typeof` c # 或运算符更为有效 `GetType` 。If a type is in an assembly known to your program at compile time, it is more efficient to use `typeof` in C# or the `GetType` operator in Visual Basic. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `typeName` 找不到，则对方法的调用将 返回 `null` 。If `typeName` cannot be found, the call to the method returns `null`. 它不会引发异常。It does not throw an exception. 若要控制是否引发异常，请调用 具有参数的方法的重载 `throwOnError` 。To control whether an exception is thrown, call an overload of the method that has a `throwOnError` parameter. 仅适用于从磁盘加载的程序集。 only works on assemblies loaded from disk. 如果调用 查找使用服务定义的动态程序集中定义的类型 ，可能会出现不一致的行为。If you call to look up a type defined in a dynamic assembly defined using the services, you might get inconsistent behavior. 此行为取决于动态程序集是否为持久性的，即使用 `RunAndSave` 枚举的或 `Save` 访问模式创建的 。The behavior depends on whether the dynamic assembly is persistent, that is, created using the `RunAndSave` or `Save` access modes of the enumeration. 如果动态程序集是持久性的，并且在调用之前已写入磁盘， `GetType` 则加载程序将在磁盘上找到保存的程序集，加载该程序集，并从该程序集检索该类型。If the dynamic assembly is persistent and has been written to disk before `GetType` is called, the loader finds the saved assembly on disk, loads that assembly, and retrieves the type from that assembly. 如果在调用时未将程序集保存到磁盘 `GetType` ，则该方法将返回 `null` 。If the assembly has not been saved to disk when `GetType` is called, the method returns `null`. `GetType` 不了解瞬态动态程序集;因此，调用 `GetType` 以检索暂时性动态程序集中的类型会返回 `null` 。`GetType` does not understand transient dynamic assemblies; therefore, calling `GetType` to retrieve a type in a transient dynamic assembly returns `null`. 若要 `GetType` 在动态模块上使用，请订阅 事件并在 `GetType` 保存前调用。To use `GetType` on a dynamic module, subscribe to the event and call `GetType` before saving. 否则，将在内存中获取程序集的两个副本。Otherwise, you will get two copies of the assembly in memory. 下表显示了 `Get` 在类型上反射时方法返回的基类成员。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成员类型Member Type|静态Static|非静态Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |构造函数Constructor|否No|否No| |字段Field|否No|可以。Yes. 字段始终按名称和签名隐藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |事件Event|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. 虚拟和非虚拟) (方法可以是按名称隐藏或按名称和签名隐藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |嵌套类型Nested Type|否No|否No| |propertiesProperty|不适用Not applicable|通用类型系统规则是指继承与实现属性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反射将属性视为隐藏的名称和签名。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 请参阅下面的注释2。See note 2 below.| 1. 按名称和签名隐藏将考虑签名的所有部分，包括自定义修饰符、返回类型、参数类型、个 sentinel 和非托管调用约定。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 这是二进制比较。This is a binary comparison. 2. 对于反射，属性和事件是按名称和签名隐藏的。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果在基类中同时具有 get 访问器和 set 访问器的属性，但派生类只有 get 访问器，则派生类属性将隐藏基类属性，并且你将无法访问基类的资源库。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自定义属性不属于通用类型系统。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 不会搜索数组或 COM 类型，除非已将它们加载到可用类的表中。Arrays or COM types are not searched for unless they have already been loaded into the table of available classes. `typeName` 可以是其命名空间限定的类型名称，也可以是包含程序集名称规范的程序集限定名称。`typeName` can be the type name qualified by its namespace or an assembly-qualified name that includes an assembly name specification. 请参阅 。See . 如果 `typeName` 包含命名空间而不包含程序集名称，则此方法将仅搜索调用对象的程序集，并按该顺序 mscorlib.dll/System.Private.CoreLib.dll。If `typeName` includes the namespace but not the assembly name, this method searches only the calling object's assembly and mscorlib.dll/System.Private.CoreLib.dll, in that order. 如果 typeName 完全限定了部分或完整的程序集名称，则此方法将在指定的程序集中搜索。If typeName is fully qualified with the partial or complete assembly name, this method searches in the specified assembly. 如果程序集具有强名称，则需要完整的程序集名称。If the assembly has a strong name, a complete assembly name is required. 属性返回完全限定的类型名称，包括嵌套类型、程序集名称和泛型类型参数。The property returns a fully qualified type name including nested types, the assembly name, and generic type arguments. 所有支持公共语言运行时的编译器都将发出嵌套类的简单名称，并且在查询时，反射将按照以下约定构造错位的名称。All compilers that support the common language runtime will emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，处理器体系结构添加到程序集标识，并可指定为程序集名称字符串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 不过，由于兼容性原因，它不包含在由属性返回的字符串中 。However, it is not included in the string returned by the property, for compatibility reasons. 还可以通过创建 对象并将其传递给方法的适当重载来加载类型 。You can also load types by creating an object and passing it to an appropriate overload of the method. 然后，可以使用 方法从程序集加载类型。You can then use the method to load types from the assembly. 另请参阅 。See also . |分隔符Delimiter|含义Meaning| |---------------|-------------| |反斜杠 (\\)Backslash (\\)|转义符。Escape character.| |反撇号 (") Backtick (\`)|在一个或多个数字之前，表示泛型类型名称末尾的类型参数的数目。Precedes one or more digits representing the number of type parameters, located at the end of the name of a generic type.| |方括号 ( [] ) Brackets ([])|为构造的泛型类型包含泛型类型参数列表;在类型参数列表中，将程序集限定的类型括起来。Enclose a generic type argument list, for a constructed generic type; within a type argument list, enclose an assembly-qualified type.| |逗号 (,)Comma (,)|在程序集名称之前。Precedes the Assembly name.| |Period (。 ) Period (.)|表示命名空间标识符。Denotes namespace identifiers.| |加号 (+)Plus sign (+)|在嵌套类之前。Precedes a nested class.| 例如，类的完全限定名称可能如下所示：For example, the fully qualified name for a class might look like this: ``` TopNamespace.SubNameSpace.ContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssembly ``` 如果命名空间为 TopNamespace + 命名空间，则字符串必须在加号 (+) 之前加上转义符 (\\) ，以防止它被解释为嵌套分隔符。If the namespace were TopNamespace.Sub+Namespace, then the string would have to precede the plus sign (+) with an escape character (\\) to prevent it from being interpreted as a nesting separator. 反射发出此字符串，如下所示：Reflection emits this string as follows: ``` TopNamespace.Sub\+Namespace.ContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssembly ``` "+ +" 变成 " \\ + \\ +"，而 " \\ " 变成 "" \\ \\ 。A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\". 此限定名称可以保留，以后用于加载 。This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the . 若要搜索并加载 ，请将 与类型名称一起使用，或者使用带有程序集限定类型名称的。To search for and load a , use either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name. 只有类型名称才会 在调用方的程序集中查找，然后在系统程序集中查找。 with the type name only will look for the in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly. 具有程序集限定类型名称的将 在任何程序集中查找。 with the assembly qualified type name will look for the in any assembly. 类型名称可能包含表示类型附加信息的尾随字符，如类型是引用类型、指针类型还是数组类型。Type names may include trailing characters that denote additional information about the type, such as whether the type is a reference type, a pointer type or an array type. 若要检索不包含这些尾随字符的类型名称，请使用 `t.GetElementType().ToString()` ，其中 `t` 是类型。To retrieve the type name without these trailing characters, use `t.GetElementType().ToString()`, where `t` is the type. 空格在除程序集名称之外的所有类型名称组件中都是相关的。Spaces are relevant in all type name components except the assembly name. 在程序集名称中，"，" 分隔符前面的空格是相关的，但 "，" 分隔符后面的空格将被忽略。In the assembly name, spaces before the ',' separator are relevant, but spaces after the ',' separator are ignored. 泛型类型的名称以反撇号 (结尾， \`) 后跟表示泛型类型参数数目的数字。The name of a generic type ends with a backtick (\`) followed by digits representing the number of generic type arguments. 此名称重整的用途是允许编译器支持具有相同名称但具有不同数量的类型参数的泛型类型，这些类型在同一范围内发生。The purpose of this name mangling is to allow compilers to support generic types with the same name but with different numbers of type parameters, occurring in the same scope. 例如，反射 `Tuple` ` and ` `2` 从泛型方法 `Tuple(Of T)` 以及 `Tuple(Of T0, T1)` 在 Visual Basic 中或在 `Tuple` `\` Visual c # 中的元组中返回错位名称为1的元组。For example, reflection returns the mangled names `Tuple`1` and `Tuple`2` from the generic methods `Tuple(Of T)` and `Tuple(Of T0, T1)` in Visual Basic, or `Tuple` and Tuple`\` in Visual C#. 对于泛型类型，类型参数列表括在括号中，类型参数由逗号分隔。For generic types, the type argument list is enclosed in brackets, and the type arguments are separated by commas. 例如，泛型 具有两个类型参数。For example, a generic has two type parameters. 具有类型的键的为的 `MyType` 可表示为，如下所示：A of `MyType` with keys of type might be represented as follows: ``` System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[System.String,MyType] ``` 若要在类型参数列表中指定程序集限定类型，请将程序集限定类型括在括号内。To specify an assembly-qualified type within a type argument list, enclose the assembly-qualified type within brackets. 否则，分隔程序集限定名称的各部分的逗号将解释为分隔附加类型参数。Otherwise, the commas that separate the parts of the assembly-qualified name are interpreted as delimiting additional type arguments. 例如， `MyType` 可以按如下所示指定具有类型的键的 fromMyAssembly.dll 的：For example, a of `MyType` fromMyAssembly.dll, with keys of type , might be specified as follows: ``` Type.GetType("System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[System.String,[MyType,MyAssembly]]") ``` > [!NOTE] > 仅当程序集限定类型出现在类型参数列表中时，才可以将其括在括号中。An assembly-qualified type can be enclosed in brackets only when it appears within a type parameter list. 用于在类型参数列表中搜索限定类型和非限定类型的程序集的规则与限定和非限定非泛型类型的规则相同。The rules for searching assemblies for qualified and unqualified types in type parameter lists are the same as the rules for qualified and unqualified nongeneric types. 可以为 null 的类型是泛型类型的特例。Nullable types are a special case of generic types. 例如， 字符串 "system.string" 1 [system.exception] 表示可以为 null。For example, a nullable is represented by the string "System.Nullable\`1[System.Int32]". > [!NOTE] > 在 c #、c + + 和 Visual Basic 中，还可以使用类型运算符获取可以为 null 的类型。In C#, C++, and Visual Basic you can also get nullable types using type operators. 例如，可以为 null 的 类型由 `typeof(Nullable)` c # 中的、通过 `Nullable::typeid` c + + 返回， `GetType(Nullable(Of Boolean))` 在 Visual Basic 中返回。For example, the nullable type is returned by `typeof(Nullable)` in C#, by `Nullable::typeid` in C++, and by `GetType(Nullable(Of Boolean))` in Visual Basic. 下表显示了 `GetType` 用于各种类型的语法。The following table shows the syntax you use with `GetType` for various types. |获取To Get|使用Use| |------------|---------| |可以为 null A nullable |``Type.GetType("System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]")``| |指向的非托管指针 `MyType`An unmanaged pointer to `MyType`|`Type.GetType("MyType*")`| |指向指向的指针的非托管指针 `MyType`An unmanaged pointer to a pointer to `MyType`|`Type.GetType("MyType**")`| |托管指针或对的引用 `MyType`A managed pointer or reference to `MyType`|`Type.GetType("MyType&")`。`Type.GetType("MyType&")`. 请注意，与指针不同，引用仅限于一个级别。Note that unlike pointers, references are limited to one level.| |父类和嵌套类A parent class and a nested class|`Type.GetType("MyParentClass+MyNestedClass")`| |下限为0的一维数组A one-dimensional array with a lower bound of 0|`Type.GetType("MyType[]")`| |下限未知的一维数组A one-dimensional array with an unknown lower bound|`Type.GetType("MyType[*]")`| |一维数组An n-dimensional array|逗号 (，括在括号内 ) ，共 n-1 次。A comma (,) inside the brackets a total of n-1 times. 例如， `System.Object[,,]` 表示一个三维 `Object` 数组。For example, `System.Object[,,]` represents a three-dimensional `Object` array.| |一维数组的数组An array of one-dimensional arrays|`Type.GetType("MyType[][]")`| |下限未知的矩形二维数组A rectangular two-dimensional array with unknown lower bounds|`Type.GetType("MyType[,]")`| |具有一个类型参数的泛型类型A generic type with one type argument|``Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[MyType]")``| |具有两个类型参数的泛型类型A generic type with two type arguments|``Type.GetType("MyGenericType`2[MyType,AnotherType]")``| |具有两个程序集限定类型参数的泛型类型A generic type with two assembly-qualified type arguments|``Type.GetType("MyGenericType`2[[MyType,MyAssembly],[AnotherType,AnotherAssembly]]")``| |具有程序集限定类型参数的程序集限定的泛型类型An assembly-qualified generic type with an assembly-qualified type argument|``Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[[MyType,MyAssembly]],MyGenericTypeAssembly")``| |一个泛型类型，其类型自变量是具有两个类型参数的泛型类型A generic type whose type argument is a generic type with two type arguments|``Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[AnotherGenericType`2[MyType,AnotherType]]")``| ## Examples 下面的示例检索的类型 `System.Int32` ，并使用该类型对象显示的 属性 `System.Int32` 。The following example retrieves the type of `System.Int32` and uses that type object to display the property of `System.Int32`. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetType/CPP/type_gettype.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetType/CS/type_gettype.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetType/VB/type_gettype.vb" id="Snippet1":::
