span.span: if the is abstract; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 在以下情况下，属性将返回：The property returns `true` in the following cases: - 当前类型是抽象的;也就是说，它不能进行实例化，但只能充当派生类的基类。The current type is abstract; that is, it cannot be instantiated, but can only serve as the base class for derived classes. 在 c # 中，抽象类标有 [abstract](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/abstract) 关键字;在 Visual Basic 中，它们用 [MustInherit](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/mustinherit) 关键字进行标记。In C#, abstract classes are marked with the [abstract](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/abstract) keyword; in Visual Basic, they are marked with the [MustInherit](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/mustinherit) keyword. - 当前类型是接口。The current type is an interface. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 对象的数组，这些对象表示以下类型： `true` 如果指定的对象为，则包含类型返回 `abstract` ; 否则返回 `false` 。The following example creates an array of objects that represent the following types:contains type returns `true` if the specified object is `abstract`; otherwise, it returns `false`. - `AbstractClass`，抽象类 (在 `abstract` c # 和 Visual Basic) 中标记为的类 `MustInherit` 。`AbstractClass`, an abstract class (a class marked as `abstract` in C# and `MustInherit` in Visual Basic). - `DerivedClass`，是从继承的类 `AbstractClass` 。`DerivedClass`, a class that inherits from `AbstractClass`. - `SingleClass`，不可继承的类。`SingleClass`, a non-inheritable class. 它定义为 `sealed` 在 c # 和 `NotInheritable` Visual Basic 中。It is defined as `sealed` in C# and `NotInheritable` in Visual Basic. - `ITypeInfo`，接口。`ITypeInfo`, an interface. - `ImplementingClass`，是实现接口的类 `ITypeInfo` 。`ImplementingClass`, a class that implements the `ITypeInfo` interface. 方法 `true` 只为 `AbstractClass` 、抽象类和 `ITypeInfo` 接口返回。The method returns `true` only for `AbstractClass`, the abstract class, and `ITypeInfo`, the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsAbstract#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isabstract/cs/isabstract1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsAbstract#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isabstract/vb/isabstract1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法可用于确定是否 `c` 可将的实例分配给当前类型的实例，当您在设计时处理其类型未知并允许进行条件赋值的对象时，该方法最为有用，如以下示例所示。The method can be used to determine whether an instance of `c` can be assigned to an instance of the current type, The method is most useful when you are handling objects whose types are not known at design time and allows for conditional assignment, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/cs/IsAssignableFrom3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/vb/IsAssignableFrom3.vb#3)] 因此，此方法可确保在运行时执行类似于下面的代码行，而不会引发 异常或类似的异常：This method thus ensures that a line of code like the following will execute at runtime without throwing an exception or a similar exception: [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/cs/IsAssignableFrom3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/vb/IsAssignableFrom3.vb#4)] 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 泛型类型定义不可从封闭式构造类型赋值。A generic type definition is not assignable from a closed constructed type. 也就是说，不能将封闭式构造类型 `MyGenericList` (`MyGenericList(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 分配给类型的变量 `MyGenericList` 。That is, you cannot assign the closed constructed type `MyGenericList` (`MyGenericList(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) to a variable of type `MyGenericList`. 如果 `c` 参数的类型为 ，则结果基于要生成的类型。If the `c` parameter is of type , the result is based on the type that is to be built. 下面的代码示例使用名为的生成类型对此进行演示 `B` 。The following code example demonstrates this using a built type named `B`. [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/cs/isassignablefrom_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/vb/isassignablefrom_ex1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 `IsAssignableFrom` 使用定义的类、整数数组和泛型的方法。The following example demonstrates the `IsAssignableFrom` method using defined classes, integer arrays, and generics. [!code-cpp[TestIsAssignableFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestIsAssignableFrom/cpp/testisassignablefrom.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TestIsAssignableFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestIsAssignableFrom/CS/testisassignablefrom.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TestIsAssignableFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestIsAssignableFrom/VB/testisassignablefrom.vb#1)] 在以下示例中，当前实例是表示 类的 对象。In the following example, the current instance is a object that represents the class. `GenericWithConstraint` 是泛型类型的泛型类型，其泛型类型参数必须为类型 。`GenericWithConstraint` is a generic type whose generic type parameter must be of type . 如果将泛型类型参数传递给 `IsAssignableFrom` 方法，则指示可以将泛型类型参数的实例分配给 对象。Passing its generic type parameter to the `IsAssignableFrom` method indicates that an instance of the generic type parameter can be assigned to an object. [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/cs/IsAssignableFrom2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsAssignableFrom#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.isassignablefrom/vb/IsAssignableFrom2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了方便。This property is provided as a convenience. 或者，您可以使用 枚举值选择类型布局特性，然后测试是否 已设置。Alternatively, you can use the enumeration value to select the type layout attributes, and then test whether is set. 、 和 枚举值指示类型的字段在内存中的布局方式。The ,, and enumeration values indicate the way the fields of the type are laid out in memory. 对于动态类型，可以在 创建类型时指定。For dynamic types, you can specify when you create the type. 在代码中，将 具有枚举值的属性应用 到类型，以使运行时确定对类进行布局的适当方式。In code, apply the attribute with the enumeration value to the type, to let the runtime determine the appropriate way to lay out the class. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用 方法确定是否已应用于 类型。You cannot use the method to determine whether the has been applied to a type. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType` `MyGenericType(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中 (，则此属性的值由 `MyGenericType.`For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType.` 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建类型的实例并显示 属性。The following example creates an instance of the type and displays the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回 `true` 类和委托的。This property returns `true` for classes as well as delegates. 它 `false` 为结构和) 枚举 (的值类型返回，即使它们已装箱也是如此。It returns `false` for value types (for structures and enumerations) even if they are boxed. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `true` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `true`. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则 `true` 当泛型类型定义是类定义时，此属性将返回; 也就是说，它不定义接口或值类型。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property returns `true` if the generic type definition is a class definition; that is, it does not define an interface or a value type. > [!NOTE] > 此属性 `true` 为 `Type` 表示和类的实例 返回 。This property returns `true` for `Type` instances that represent the and classes. 这两个类分别是枚举和值类型的基类型，但它们不是枚举或值类型本身。These two classes are the base types for enumerations and value types, respectively, but they are not enumerations or value types themselves. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 属性。For more information, see the and properties. 枚举值将类型声明分为类或接口。但是，类和值类型都是用特性标记的 。The enumeration value distinguishes a type declaration as class or interface.However, both classes and value types are marked with the attribute. 如果检索类型属性的值，并使用 该值来确定类型是否是类而不是值类型，则还必须调用 属性。If you retrieve the value of a type's Attributes property and use the value to determine whether a type is a class instead of a value type, you must also call the property. 枚举的示例 包含附加信息以及 anexample。The example for the enumeration contains additional information as well as anexample. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个类型的实例，并指示该类型是否为类。The following example creates an instance of a type and indicates whether the type is a class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 `false` 对于 COM 接口返回，因为它们不是对象。This method returns `false` for COM interfaces because they are not objects. COM 接口可由 Microsoft .NET Framework 对象实现。COM interfaces can be implemented by Microsoft .NET Framework objects. 还可以加载 COM 类，并 `Type` 通过使用 [Tlbimp.exe (类型库导入程序) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer) 工具来获取该 com 类的对象。You can also load a COM class and get a `Type` object for that COM class by using the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer) tool. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType，则此属性的值由确定 `MyGenericType` 。For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType`. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.

summary.span: 确定两个 COM 类型是否具有相同的标识，以及是否符合类型等效的条件。

span.span: Determines whether two COM types have the same identity and are eligible for type equivalence.

returns.span: 如果 COM 类型等效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the COM types are equivalent; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果一个类型位于为执行加载的程序集中，而另一个类型位于已加载到仅限反射上下文的程序集中，则此方法也返回 。

span.span: This method also returns if one type is in an assembly that is loaded for execution, and the other is in an assembly that is loaded into the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，公共语言运行时支持直接将 COM 类型的类型信息嵌入到托管程序集中，而不需要托管程序集从互操作程序集获取 com 类型的类型信息。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime supports the embedding of type information for COM types directly into managed assemblies, instead of requiring the managed assemblies to obtain type information for COM types from interop assemblies. 由于嵌入式类型信息仅包含托管程序集实际使用的类型和成员，因此两个托管程序集可能具有相同 COM 类型的不同视图。Because the embedded type information includes only the types and members that are actually used by a managed assembly, two managed assemblies might have very different views of the same COM type. 每个托管程序集都有不同的 对象来表示其 COM 类型视图。Each managed assembly has a different object to represent its view of the COM type. 公共语言运行时支持接口、结构、枚举和委托等不同视图之间的类型等效性。The common language runtime supports type equivalence between these different views for interfaces, structures, enumerations, and delegates. 类型等效性意味着从一个托管程序集传递到另一个托管程序集的 COM 对象可以转换为接收程序集中适当的托管类型。Type equivalence means that a COM object that is passed from one managed assembly to another can be cast to the appropriate managed type in the receiving assembly. 方法使程序集能够确定从另一个程序集获取的 com 对象与第一个程序集自己的嵌入互操作类型之一具有相同的 com 标识，因此可以强制转换为该类型。The method enables an assembly to determine that a COM object obtained from another assembly has the same COM identity as one of the first assembly's own embedded interop types, and thus can be cast to that type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [类型等效性和嵌入的互操作类型](/dotnet/framework/interop/type-equivalence-and-embedded-interop-types)。For more information, see [Type Equivalence and Embedded Interop Types](/dotnet/framework/interop/type-equivalence-and-embedded-interop-types).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了方便。This property is provided as a convenience. 或者，您可以使用 枚举值选择类型布局特性，然后测试是否 已设置。Alternatively, you can use the enumeration value to select the type layout attributes, and then test whether is set. 、 和 枚举值指示类型的字段在内存中的布局方式。The , , and enumeration values indicate the way the fields of the type are laid out in memory. 对于动态类型，可以在 创建类型时指定。For dynamic types, you can specify when you create the type. 在代码中，将 具有枚举值的属性应用 到类型，以指定显式指定字段开始的偏移量。In code, apply the attribute with the enumeration value to the type, to specify that the offsets at which the fields start are specified explicitly. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用 方法确定是否已应用于 类型。You cannot use the method to determine whether the has been applied to a type. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType` `MyGenericType(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中 (，则此属性的值由确定 `MyGenericType` 。For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType`. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个类型的实例，并显示其属性的值 。The following example creates an instance of a type and displays the value of its property. 它使用 `MySystemTime` 类，该类也在的代码示例中 。It uses the `MySystemTime` class, which is also in the code example for . [!code-csharp[Type_IsExplicitLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsExplicitLayout/CS/type_isexplicitlayout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_IsExplicitLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsExplicitLayout/VB/type_isexplicitlayout.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过调用 表示泛型类型定义的对象的方法或 表示泛型方法定义的对象的方法来获取表示泛型类型参数的对象。 objects that represent generic type parameters can be obtained by calling the method of a object that represents a generic type definition, or the method of a object that represents a generic method definition. - 对于泛型类型或方法定义， 属性 `true` 为所得数组的每个元素返回。For a generic type or method definition, the property returns `true` for every element of the resulting array. - 对于封闭式构造类型或方法， 属性 `false` 为该方法返回的数组的每个元素返回 。For a closed constructed type or method, the property returns `false` for every element of the array returned by the method. - 对于开放构造的类型或方法，数组的某些元素可能是特定类型，而其他元素可能为类型参数。For an open constructed type or method, some elements of the array might be specific types and others might be type parameters. 为类型 `false` `true` 参数和类型参数返回。 returns `false` for the types and `true` for the type parameters. 属性的代码示例 演示了混合类型和类型参数的泛型类。The code example for the property demonstrates a generic class with a mixture of types and type parameters. 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性测试泛型类型中的泛型类型参数。The following example uses the property to test for generic type parameters in a generic type. [!code-cpp[System.Type.IsGenericParameter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericParameter/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsGenericParameter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericParameter/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsGenericParameter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericParameter/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性来确定 对象是否表示泛型类型。Use the property to determine whether a object represents a generic type. 使用 属性可确定 对象表示开放构造类型还是封闭式构造类型。Use the property to determine whether a object represents an open constructed type or a closed constructed type. > [!NOTE] > `false` 如果直接类型不是泛型，则属性返回。The property returns `false` if the immediate type is not generic. 例如，其元素属于 `A` Visual Basic) 中 (类型的数组 `A(Of Integer)` 本身不是泛型类型。For example, an array whose elements are of type `A` (`A(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) is not itself a generic type. 下表总结了泛型反射中使用的常用术语的固定条件。The following table summarizes the invariant conditions for common terms used in generic reflection. |术语Term|固定条件Invariant| |----------|---------------| |Generic Type Definition — 泛型类型定义generic type definition| 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.

定义泛型类型。Defines a generic type. 构造类型是通过 对 表示泛型类型定义并指定类型参数数组的对象调用方法创建的。A constructed type is created by calling the method on a object that represents a generic type definition and specifying an array of type arguments.

只能对泛型类型定义调用。 can be called only on generic type definitions.

任何泛型类型定义都是) 属性 (的泛型类型 `true` ，但反之不成立。Any generic type definition is a generic type (the property is `true`), but the converse is not true.| |Generic Type — 泛型类型generic type| 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.

可以是泛型类型定义、开放式构造类型或封闭式构造类型。Can be a generic type definition, an open constructed type, or a closed constructed type.

请注意，其元素类型为泛型的数组类型本身不是泛型类型。Note that an array type whose element type is generic is not itself a generic type. 表示指向泛型类型的指针的对象也是如此 。The same is true of a object representing a pointer to a generic type.| |开放式构造类型open constructed type| 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.

例如，具有未分配的类型参数的泛型类型、嵌套在泛型类型定义中的类型或开放构造类型中的泛型类型，或者具有属性所属的类型参数的泛型类型 `true` 。Examples are a generic type that has unassigned type parameters, a type that is nested in a generic type definition or in an open constructed type, or a generic type that has a type argument for which the property is `true`.

不能创建开放式构造类型的实例。It is not possible to create an instance of an open constructed type.

请注意，并非所有开放式构造类型都是泛型的。Note that not all open constructed types are generic. 例如，其元素类型为泛型类型定义的数组不是泛型类型，而指向开放式构造类型的指针不是泛型类型。For example, an array whose element type is a generic type definition is not generic, and a pointer to an open constructed type is not generic.| |封闭式构造类型closed constructed type| 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`.

递归检查时，类型没有未分配的泛型参数。When examined recursively, the type has no unassigned generic parameters.| |Generic Type Parameter — 泛型类型参数generic type parameter| 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.

属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.

在泛型类型定义中，将在稍后赋值的类型的占位符。In a generic type definition, a placeholder for a type that will be assigned later.| |Generic Type Argument — 泛型类型变量generic type argument|可以是任何类型，包括泛型类型参数。Can be any type, including a generic type parameter.

类型参数指定为 在创建构造的泛型类型时传递给方法的对象数组。Type arguments are specified as an array of objects passed to the method when creating a constructed generic type. 如果要创建结果类型的实例，则该 属性必须 `false` 为所有类型自变量。If instances of the resulting type are to be created, the property must be `false` for all the type arguments.| 下面的代码示例和表说明了其中一些术语和固定条件。The following code example and table illustrate some of these terms and invariants. `Derived`类特别感兴趣，因为其基类型是一个构造类型，该类型在其类型参数列表中混合了类型和类型参数。The `Derived` class is of particular interest because its base type is a constructed type that has a mixture of types and type parameters in its type argument list. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericType/cpp/remarks.cpp" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericType/cs/remarks.cs" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericType/vb/remarks.vb" id="Snippet2"::: 下表显示在类、和上使用和生成的 `Base` 示例 `Derived` `G` 。The following table shows examples that use and build on the classes `Base`, `Derived`, and `G`. 如果 c + + 和 c # 代码相同，则只显示一个条目。When the C++ and C# code is the same, only one entry is shown. |示例Example|固定协定Invariants| |-------------|----------------| |`Derived(Of V)`

`Derived`|对于此类型：For this type:

为 `true`。 is `true`.

为 `true`。 is `true`.

为 `true`。 is `true`.| |`Base(Of String, V)`

`Base`

`Base`|对于此类型：For this type:

为 `true`。 is `true`.

为 `false`。 is `false`.

为 `true`。 is `true`.| |`Dim d() As Derived(Of Integer)`

`Derived[] d;`

`array^>^ d;`|对于变量类型 `d` ：For the type of variable `d`:

为， `false` 因为 `d` 是一个数组。 is `false` because `d` is an array.

为 `false`。 is `false`.

为 `false`。 is `false`.| |`T`、 `U` 和 `V` (出现在任何位置) `T`, `U`, and `V` (everywhere they appear)| 为 `true`。 is `true`.

是 `false` 因为没有办法将类型形参约束为泛型类型。 is `false` because there is no way to constrain a type parameter to generic types.

为 `false`。 is `false`.

是 `true` 因为 `T` 、 `U` 和 `V` 是本身的泛型类型参数。 is `true` because `T`, `U`, and `V` are themselves generic type parameters. 这并不意味着有关稍后分配给它们的类型参数的任何信息。This does not imply anything about type arguments that are assigned to them later.| |字段的类型 `F`The type of field `F`| 为 `true`。 is `true`.

是 `false` 因为类型已分配给的类型参数 `G` 。 is `false` because a type has been assigned to the type parameter of `G`. 请注意，这等效于调用 方法。Note that this is equivalent to having called the method.

是 `true` 因为字段的类型 `F` 具有一个类型参数，该类型参数是一个开放式构造类型。 is `true` because the type of field `F` has a type argument that is an open constructed type. 构造类型是开放式的，因为其类型参数 (为， `Base`) 是泛型类型定义。The constructed type is open because its type argument (that is, `Base`) is a generic type definition. 这说明了属性的递归特性 。This illustrates the recursive nature of the property.| |嵌套类 `Nested`The nested class `Nested`| 为 `true` ，即使 `Nested` 类没有自己的泛型类型参数，因为它嵌套在泛型类型中。 is `true`, even though the `Nested` class has no generic type parameters of its own, because it is nested in a generic type.

为 `true`。 is `true`. 也就是说，您可以调用 方法并提供封闭类型的类型参数 `Derived` 。That is, you can call the method and supply the type parameter of the enclosing type, `Derived`.

是 `true` 因为封闭类型 `Derived` 具有泛型类型参数。 is `true` because the enclosing type, `Derived`, has generic type parameters. 这说明了属性的递归特性 。This illustrates the recursive nature of the property.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 "备注" 部分中描述的类型的、、和 属性的值。The following code example displays the value of the , , , and properties for the types described in the Remarks section. 有关属性值的说明，请参阅 "备注" 中附带的表。For explanations of the property values, see the accompanying table in Remarks. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericType/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericType/cs/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericType/vb/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 是否表示可以用来构造其他泛型类型的泛型类型定义。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current represents a generic type definition, from which other generic types can be constructed.

value.span: 如果此 对象表示泛型类型定义，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object represents a generic type definition; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类型定义是可以从中构造其他类型的模板。A generic type definition is a template from which other types can be constructed. 例如，从泛型类型定义 `G` (用 c # 语法表示）; `G(Of T)` 在 Visual Basic 或 `generic ref class G` c + + 中) `G` ，可以通过在 `G(Of Integer)` 包含类型的泛型参数列表中调用方法，在 Visual Basic) 中构造和实例化类型 ( 。For example, from the generic type definition `G` (expressed in C# syntax; `G(Of T)` in Visual Basic or `generic ref class G` in C++) you can construct and instantiate the type `G` (`G(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), by calling the method with a generic argument list containing the type. 给定 表示此构造类型的对象后， 方法将再次获取该泛型类型定义。Given a object representing this constructed type, the method gets the generic type definition back again. 使用 属性可确定是否可以从当前类型创建新类型。Use the property to determine whether you can create new types from the current type. 如果 属性返回 `true` ，则可以调用 方法来创建新的泛型类型。If the property returns `true`, you can call the method to create new generic types. 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下面的示例显示有关类型的信息，包括该类型是否为泛型类型定义。The following example displays information about a type, including whether or not it is a generic type definition. 为构造类型、泛型类型定义和普通类型显示信息。Information is displayed for a constructed type, for its generic type definition, and for an ordinary type. [!code-cpp[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType` `MyGenericType(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中 (，则此属性的值由 `MyGenericType.`For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType.` 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 构造类型不是其泛型类型定义的实例。A constructed type is not an instance of its generic type definition. 也就是说， `MyGenericList` `MyGenericList(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中的 () 不是 `MyGenericList` Visual Basic) 中的 (的实例 `MyGenericList(Of T)` 。That is, `MyGenericList` (`MyGenericList(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) is not an instance of `MyGenericList` (`MyGenericList(Of T)` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `IsInstanceOfType` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `IsInstanceOfType` method. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestIsInstanceOfType/CPP/testisinstanceoftype.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestIsInstanceOfType/CS/testisinstanceoftype.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestIsInstanceOfType/VB/testisinstanceoftype.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 类型声明与类、接口或值类型区分开来。The distinguishes a type declaration as class, interface or value type. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个接口，检查接口类型，并指示类是否 `IsInterface` 设置了属性。The following example creates an interface, checks for the interface type, and indicates whether a class has the `IsInterface` property set. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsInterface/CPP/type_isinterface.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsInterface/CS/type_isinterface.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsInterface/VB/type_isinterface.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了方便。This property is provided as a convenience. 或者，您可以使用 枚举值选择类型布局特性，然后测试是否 已设置。Alternatively, you can use the enumeration value to select the type layout attributes, and then test whether is set. 、 和 枚举值指示类型的字段在内存中的布局方式。The , , and enumeration values indicate the way the fields of the type are laid out in memory. 对于动态类型，可以在 创建类型时指定。For dynamic types, you can specify when you create the type. 在代码中，将 具有枚举值的属性应用 到类型，以指定布局是连续的。In code, apply the attribute with the enumeration value to the type, to specify that layout is sequential. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用 方法确定是否已应用于 类型。You cannot use the method to determine whether the has been applied to a type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 (CLI) 文档 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 一节中的 "公共语言基础结构规范" 部分的9.1.2。For more information, see section 9.1.2 of the specification for the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType` `MyGenericType(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中 (，则此属性的值由确定 `MyGenericType` 。For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType`. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建类的一个实例，该类的 枚举值已 设置， 并检查属性，并显示结果。The following example creates an instance of a class for which the enumeration value in the class has been set, checks for the property, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[Type_IsLayoutSequential#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsLayoutSequential/CPP/type_islayoutsequential.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_IsLayoutSequential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsLayoutSequential/CS/type_islayoutsequential.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_IsLayoutSequential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsLayoutSequential/VB/type_islayoutsequential.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsSecurityCritical { get; }
.property instance bool IsSecurityCritical
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSecurityCritical As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSecurityCritical { bool get(); };
member this.IsSecurityCritical : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前的类型在当前信任级别上是安全关键的还是安全可靠关键的，并因此可以执行关键操作。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current type is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level, and therefore can perform critical operations.

value.span: 如果当前类型在当前信任级别上是安全关键的或安全可靠关键的，则为 ；如果它是透明的，则为 。

span.span: if the current type is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、 和 属性在其当前信任级别报告类型的透明度级别，由公共语言运行时 (CLR) 确定。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the type at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表显示了这些属性的组合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全级别Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |严重Critical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全关键Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用这些属性比检查程序集及其类型的安全批注、检查当前的信任级别，以及尝试复制运行时的规则要简单得多。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于部分信任的程序集，此属性的值取决于程序集的当前信任级别。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果程序集加载到部分受信任的应用程序域中 (例如，在沙盒应用程序域) 中，则运行时将忽略程序集的安全注释。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), then the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 程序集及其所有类型都被视为透明。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 仅当程序集加载到完全受信任的应用程序域中时，运行时才会注意到部分信任程序集的安全批注 (例如，在桌面应用程序) 的默认应用程序域中。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 相反，受信任的程序集 (即，安装在全局程序集缓存中的强名称程序集) 始终以完全信任方式加载，而不考虑应用程序域的信任级别，因此，其当前信任级别始终是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 您可以使用和属性来确定程序集和应用程序域的当前信任级别 。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 有关反射和透明度的详细信息，请参阅 [反射的安全注意事项](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection). 有关透明度的信息，请参阅 [安全更改](/dotnet/framework/security/security-changes)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](/dotnet/framework/security/security-changes).

span.span: Security Considerations for Reflection
Security Changes in the .NET Framework

summary.span: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 是否为可序列化的。

span.span: if the is serializable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Standard 中定义的类型未标记为 。Types that are defined in the .NET Standard are not marked with . 相反，每个 .NET 实现确定类型是否可序列化。Instead, each .NET implementation determines whether a type is serializable. 在运行时，可以使用 属性来确定该实现是否支持对该类型的实例进行序列化。At run time, you can use the property to determine whether that implementation supports serialization of an instance of the type. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅 [如何确定 .NET Standard 对象是否可以序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/how-to-determine-if-netstandard-object-is-serializable)。For more information and an example, see [How to determine if a .NET Standard object is serializable](/dotnet/standard/serialization/how-to-determine-if-netstandard-object-is-serializable). 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType` `MyGenericType(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中 (，则此属性的值由确定 `MyGenericType` 。For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType`. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 `false` 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建类的一个实例 `MyTestClass` ，设置 [Serializable] 特性，并检查或的 `IsSerializable` 属性 `true` `false` 。The following example creates an instance of `MyTestClass` class, sets the [Serializable] attribute, and checks the `IsSerializable` property for `true` or `false`. [!code-cpp[Type_IsSerializable#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsSerializable/CPP/type_isserializable.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_IsSerializable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsSerializable/CS/type_isserializable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_IsSerializable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_IsSerializable/VB/type_isserializable.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用 方法来确定以下任何内容：You can call the method to determine any of the following: - 一个类是否派生自另一个类。Whether one class derives from another. - 类型是否派生自 。Whether a type derives from . 不过， 是一种更有效的方法来确定类型是否为值类型。However, the is a more efficient way to determine whether a type is a value type. - 类型是否派生自 。Whether a type derives from . 不过， 方法是一种更有效的方法来确定类型是否为枚举。However, the method is a more efficient way to determine whether a type is an enumeration. - 类型是否为委托，即是否从 或派生 。Whether a type is a delegate, that is, whether it derives from either or . 方法不能用于确定接口是派生自另一个接口，还是类实现接口。The method cannot be used to determine whether an interface derives from another interface, or whether a class implements an interface. 使用 方法实现此目的，如以下示例所示。Use the method for that purpose, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsSubclassOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.issubclassof/cs/issubclassof_interface1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsSubclassOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.issubclassof/vb/issubclassof_interface1.vb#1)] 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则它从其类约束派生或从中派生（ 如果它没有类约束）。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, it derives from its class constraint or from if it has no class constraint. > [!NOTE] > 除了与接口一起使用时，与 相反 。Except when used with interfaces, is the converse of . 也就是说，如果 `t1.IsSubclassOf(t2)` 为 `true` ，则 `t2.IsAssignableFrom(t1)` 也是 `true` 。That is, if `t1.IsSubclassOf(t2)` is `true`, then `t2.IsAssignableFrom(t1)` is also `true`. 此方法可由派生类重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为的类 `Class1` 和一个名为的派生类 `DerivedC1` 。The following example creates a class named `Class1` and a derived class named `DerivedC1`. 它调用 方法以显示是的 `DerivedC1` 子类 `Class1` 。It calls the method to show that `DerivedC1` is a subclass of `Class1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果实例表示直接在程序集中定义的类型，则实例是类型定义，与根据其他类型按需构造的类型相比。A instance is a type definition if it represents the type directly defined in assembly, in contrast to types that are constructed on demand based on other types. 例如，基元类型、类、结构或泛型类型定义是类型定义，但数组、引用、指针或实例化泛型类型不是。For example, a primitive type, class, structure, or generic type definition is a type definition, but an array, reference, pointer, or instantiated generic type isn't.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以编写将特定类型分配给泛型类型定义的类型参数的代码，从而创建 表示特定构造类型的对象。The method allows you to write code that assigns specific types to the type parameters of a generic type definition, thus creating a object that represents a particular constructed type. 您可以使用此 对象创建构造类型的运行时实例。You can use this object to create run-time instances of the constructed type. 用构造的类型 可以是开放的，也就是说，它们的某些类型参数可以是封闭泛型方法或类型的类型参数。Types constructed with can be open, that is, some of their type arguments can be type parameters of enclosing generic methods or types. 发出动态程序集时，可以使用此类开放式构造类型。You might use such open constructed types when you emit dynamic assemblies. 例如，请考虑 `Base` `Derived` 以下代码中的类和。For example, consider the classes `Base` and `Derived` in the following code. [!code-cpp[System.Type.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.makegenerictype/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.makegenerictype/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.makegenerictype/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 若要 `Derived` 在动态程序集中生成，需要构造其基类型。To generate `Derived` in a dynamic assembly, it is necessary to construct its base type. 为此，请 `Base` 使用泛型类型参数 和中的类型参数对表示类的对象调用方法 `V` `Derived` 。To do this, call the method on a object representing the class `Base`, using the generic type arguments and the type parameter `V` from `Derived`. 因为类型和泛型类型参数均由对象表示 ，所以，同时包含这两个参数的数组可传递给 方法。Because types and generic type parameters are both represented by objects, an array containing both can be passed to the method. > [!NOTE] > 发出代码时，构造类型（如） `Base` 非常有用，但不能对 此类型调用方法，因为它不是泛型类型定义。A constructed type such as `Base` is useful when emitting code, but you cannot call the method on this type because it is not a generic type definition. 若要创建可以实例化的封闭式构造类型，请首先调用 方法获取 表示泛型类型定义的对象，然后 使用所需的类型参数调用。To create a closed constructed type that can be instantiated, first call the method to get a object representing the generic type definition and then call with the desired type arguments. 返回的对象与 通过调用生成的构造类型的方法获得的相同 ，或与 使用相同的类型自变量从同一泛型类型定义创建的任何构造类型的方法相同。The object returned by is the same as the obtained by calling the method of the resulting constructed type, or the method of any constructed type that was created from the same generic type definition using the same type arguments. > [!NOTE] > 泛型类型的数组本身不是泛型类型。An array of generic types is not itself a generic type. 不能 对 `C[]` Visual Basic) 中的数组类型（如 (）调用 `Dim ac() As C(Of T)` 。You cannot call on an array type such as `C[]` (`Dim ac() As C(Of T)` in Visual Basic). 若要从构造闭的泛型类型 `C[]` ，请调用 以获取泛型类型定义 `C` ; 对 泛型类型定义调用以创建构造类型; 最后，在 构造类型上调用方法以创建数组类型。To construct a closed generic type from `C[]`, call to obtain the generic type definition `C`; call on the generic type definition to create the constructed type; and finally call the method on the constructed type to create the array type. `ref`Visual Basic) 中 (的指针类型和类型也是如此 `ByRef` 。The same is true of pointer types and `ref` types (`ByRef` in Visual Basic). 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 属性注解。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## 嵌套类型Nested Types 如果使用 c #、c + + 或 Visual Basic 定义泛型类型，则其嵌套类型都是通用的。If a generic type is defined using C#, C++, or Visual Basic, then its nested types are all generic. 即使嵌套类型没有自己的类型参数，也是如此，因为所有这三种语言都包括嵌套类型的类型参数列表中的封闭类型的类型参数。This is true even if the nested types have no type parameters of their own, because all three languages include the type parameters of enclosing types in the type parameter lists of nested types. 请考虑以下类：Consider the following classes: [!code-cpp[System.Type.MakeGenericType#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.makegenerictype/cpp/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.MakeGenericType#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.makegenerictype/cs/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.MakeGenericType#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.makegenerictype/vb/remarks.vb#2)] 嵌套类的类型参数列表 `Inner` 具有两个类型参数， `T` `U` 第一个参数是其封闭类的类型参数。The type parameter list of the nested class `Inner` has two type parameters, `T` and `U`, the first of which is the type parameter of its enclosing class. 同样，嵌套类的类型参数列表 `Innermost1` 具有三个类型参数：、 `T` `U` 和 `V` ， `T` `U` 它们来自其封闭类。Similarly, the type parameter list of the nested class `Innermost1` has three type parameters, `T`, `U`, and `V`, with `T` and `U` coming from its enclosing classes. 嵌套类 `Innermost2` 有两个类型参数： `T` 和 `U` ，它们来自其封闭类。The nested class `Innermost2` has two type parameters, `T` and `U`, which come from its enclosing classes. 如果封闭类型的参数列表具有多个类型参数，则按顺序列出的所有类型参数都包含在嵌套类型的类型参数列表中。If the parameter list of the enclosing type has more than one type parameter, all the type parameters in order are included in the type parameter list of the nested type. 若要从嵌套类型的泛型类型定义构造泛型类型，请 使用由最外面的泛型类型开始的所有封闭类型的类型参数数组，并以嵌套类型本身的类型参数数组（如果它拥有自己的类型参数）以构造的类型参数数组的形式调用方法。To construct a generic type from the generic type definition for a nested type, call the method with the array formed by concatenating the type argument arrays of all the enclosing types, beginning with the outermost generic type, and ending with the type argument array of the nested type itself, if it has type parameters of its own. 若要创建的实例 `Innermost1` ，请 使用包含三种类型的数组调用方法，将其分配给 T、U 和 V。若要创建的实例 `Innermost2` ，请 使用包含两个类型的数组调用方法，将其分配给 T 和 U。To create an instance of `Innermost1`, call the method with an array containing three types, to be assigned to T, U, and V. To create an instance of `Innermost2`, call the method with an array containing two types, to be assigned to T and U. 语言以这种方式传播封闭类型的类型参数，因此可以使用封闭类型的类型参数来定义嵌套类型的字段。The languages propagate the type parameters of enclosing types in this fashion so you can use the type parameters of an enclosing type to define fields of nested types. 否则，类型参数将不会位于嵌套类型体内的范围内。Otherwise, the type parameters would not be in scope within the bodies of the nested types. 通过在动态程序集中发出代码或通过使用 [Ilasm.exe (IL 汇编程序) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler)，可以定义嵌套类型而无需传播封闭类型的类型参数。It is possible to define nested types without propagating the type parameters of enclosing types, by emitting code in dynamic assemblies or by using the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler). 对于 MSIL 组装器，请考虑以下代码：Consider the following code for the MSIL assembler: ``` .class public Outer { .class nested public Inner { .class nested public Innermost { } } } ``` 在此示例中，不能在类中定义类型为或的字段 `T` `U` `Innermost` ，因为这些类型参数不在范围内。In this example, it is not possible to define a field of type `T` or `U` in class `Innermost`, because those type parameters are not in scope. 以下汇编程序代码定义了嵌套类，它们的行为方式与它们在 c + +、Visual Basic 和 c # 中的定义方式相同：The following assembler code defines nested classes that behave the way they would if defined in C++, Visual Basic, and C#: ``` .class public Outer { .class nested public Inner { .class nested public Innermost { } } } ``` 您可以使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) 检查在高级语言中定义的嵌套类，并观察此命名方案。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) to examine nested classes defined in the high-level languages and observe this naming scheme. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法从类型的泛型类型定义中创建构造类型 。The following example uses the method to create a constructed type from the generic type definition for the type. 构造类型表示 `Test` 具有字符串键的对象的。The constructed type represents a of `Test` objects with string keys. [!code-cpp[System.Type.BindGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.BindGenericParameters/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.BindGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.BindGenericParameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.BindGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.BindGenericParameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将重写 。This property overrides . 因此，在检查一组对象（ 例如，返回的数组） 时， 当给定成员是嵌套类型时，属性将返回。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects - for example, the array returned by - the property returns when a given member is a nested type. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性应用于构造该类型的泛型类型定义。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed. 例如，如果当前 表示 `MyGenericType` `MyGenericType(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中 (，则此属性的值由确定 `MyGenericType` 。For example, if the current represents `MyGenericType` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType`. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此属性始终返回 。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将该 `MemberType` 字段显示为方法的参数 `GetMember` ：The following code example shows the `MemberType` field as a parameter to the `GetMember` method: [!code-cpp[Classic Type.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Type.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Type.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间是逻辑设计时命名方便，主要用于在应用程序中定义作用域，并在单个层次结构中组织类和其他类型。A namespace is a logical design-time naming convenience, used mainly to define scope in an application and organize classes and other types in a single hierarchical structure. 从运行时的角度来看，没有任何命名空间。From the viewpoint of the runtime, there are no namespaces. 如果当前 表示构造泛型类型，则此属性返回包含泛型类型定义的命名空间。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property returns the namespace that contains the generic type definition. 同样，如果当前 表示泛型参数，则 `T` 此属性返回包含定义的泛型类型定义的命名空间 `T` 。Similarly, if the current represents a generic parameter `T`, this property returns the namespace that contains the generic type definition that defines `T`. 如果当前 对象表示泛型参数，则此属性返回 `null` 。If the current object represents a generic parameter, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `Namespace` 和 属性以及的 方法 。This following example demonstrates a use of the `Namespace` and properties and the method of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含该类型的程序集尚未加载到仅反射上下文中，则使用 方法等效于首先使用方法加载该程序集，然后 通过调用程序集的方法加载该类型 。If the assembly containing the type is not already loaded into the reflection-only context, using the method is equivalent to first loading the assembly for reflection only, using the method, and then loading the type by calling the assembly's method. 有关程序集限定名称的信息，请参见 属性。For information about assembly-qualified names, see the property. 有关指定类型名称的更多详细信息，请参阅 方法重载。For additional details on specifying type names, see the method overload. 如果程序集已加载以便执行，则将另一个副本加载到仅反射上下文中。If the assembly is already loaded for execution, another copy is loaded into the reflection-only context. `throwIfNotFound`参数指定当找不到该类型时所发生的情况，还会取消某些其他异常条件，如 "异常" 一节中所述。The `throwIfNotFound` parameter specifies what happens when the type is not found, and also suppresses certain other exception conditions, as described in the Exceptions section. 引发一些异常，而不考虑的值 `throwIfNotFound` 。Some exceptions are thrown regardless of the value of `throwIfNotFound`. 例如，如果程序集无效，即使为，也 会引发 `throwIfNotFound` `false` 。For example, if the assembly is not valid, a is thrown even if `throwIfNotFound` is `false`. 有关使用仅反射上下文的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：将程序集加载到仅反射上下文](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-load-assemblies-into-the-reflection-only-context)中。For more information about using the reflection-only context, see [How to: Load Assemblies into the Reflection-Only Context](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-load-assemblies-into-the-reflection-only-context).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为所有基元类型返回完全限定的公共语言运行时命名空间和名称。This method returns the fully qualified common language runtime namespace and name for all primitive types. 例如，c # 指令 `(long)0.Type().ToString()` 返回 "system.string" 而不只是 "Int64"。For example, the C# instruction, `(long)0.Type().ToString()` returns "System.Int64" instead of merely "Int64". 如果当前 表示泛型类型，则类型及其类型参数由命名空间和嵌套类型限定，而不是由程序集限定。If the current represents a generic type, the type and its type arguments are qualified by namespace and by nested type, but not by assembly. 如果当前 表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的类型参数，则此方法返回类型参数的非限定名称。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method returns the unqualified name of the type parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 和 属性以及的 `ToString` 方法 。This following example demonstrates a use of the and properties and the `ToString` method of . [!code-cpp[Type_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_ToString/CPP/type_tostring.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_ToString/CS/type_tostring.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_ToString/VB/type_tostring.vb#1)] 下面的示例将方法返回的字符串 `ToString` 与 、 和属性进行比较 。The following example compares the strings returned by the `ToString` method and the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/cs/fullname1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/vb/fullname1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TypeHandle` 封装指向表示类型的内部数据结构的指针。`TypeHandle` encapsulates a pointer to an internal data structure that represents the type. 此句柄在进程生存期内是唯一的。This handle is unique during the process lifetime. 该句柄仅在获取该句柄的应用程序域中有效。The handle is valid only in the application domain in which it was obtained. ## Examples 下面的示例返回相应类型的句柄，并将该句柄传递给一个方法，该方法从句柄获取类型并显示该类型。The following example returns the handle of the corresponding type and passes the handle to a method that gets the type from the handle and displays it.
